name: Betrayed Guard
description: You were a sworn member of the city watch, dedicated to upholding the law. You grew up believing in order and justice, but you were betrayed by your own partner during a critical moment. They left you for dead to cover up a crime or to take the credit for a heroic bust, shattering your faith in the very system you vowed to protect.

name: Exiled Apprentice
description: You were the promising apprentice to a powerful mage, spending your youth immersed in arcane study. But you were betrayed by your master, who framed you for a magical accident or stole your groundbreaking research to claim as their own. Cast out from the academy, you now seek forbidden knowledge to surpass the one who wronged you.

name: Swindled Merchant
description: You were a shrewd merchant, building a small fortune through clever deals and reliable trade. However, you were ruined by a business partner you trusted completely. They sabotaged your caravan, stole your ledger, or used your good name to accrue massive debts, leaving you bankrupt and forcing you into a more... direct line of work to survive.

name: Disgraced Artisan
description: You were a master craftsman, your name synonymous with quality. But a jealous rival, or perhaps your own apprentice, stole the credit for your masterwork or subtly sabotaged your commission for a noble patron. Your reputation was shattered, your guild membership revoked, and you were forced to leave your workshop behind.

name: Framed Spy
description: You served a kingdom or a powerful figure as a spy, moving through the shadows to gather intelligence. During a critical mission, you were betrayed by your handler, who sold you out to the enemy to protect a higher-ranking agent or to settle a personal score. You escaped, but you are now a person without a country, hunted by both your former enemies and allies.

name: Cast-Out Healer
description: You were a healer, respected for your knowledge of medicine and your gentle touch. But when a plague swept through your town or a noble fell ill, your best efforts were not enough. A rival physician or a panicked mob blamed you for the death, accusing you of incompetence or even malevolence. You were driven out, your good name turned to poison.

name: Ostracized Hunter
description: You were the primary hunter for your village, respected for your skill in tracking and providing for the community. But during a hunt for a great beast, a rival hunter sabotaged your efforts out of jealousy, leading to a disastrous failure or the injury of another. They turned the village against you, and you were exiled from the only home you've ever known.

name: Shipwrecked Sailor
description: You were a sailor, at home on the sea. But during a fierce storm, your captain or first mate prioritized saving the ship's cargo over the crew. You were left adrift and presumed dead after the shipwreck, eventually washing ashore in a strange land with nothing but the clothes on your back and a burning distrust for those in command.

name: Muted Bard
description: You were a renowned musician or storyteller, your voice and talent known throughout the land. However, you learned a dangerous truth or sang a satirical song about the wrong nobleman. A powerful rival hired someone to silence you, not by killing you, but by crushing your instrument or scarring your throat, forcing you to find a new way to make your voice heard.

name: Fallen Priest
description: You were a devout member of a holy order, on a path to high standing. But you were excommunicated after being betrayed by a fellow priest who coveted your position. They manufactured a heresy, planted a forbidden text in your quarters, or twisted your words to sound like blasphemy, turning your faith into a weapon against you.

name: Militaristic Theocracy
description: You were raised in a society where military service and religious devotion are one and the same. Every citizen is a soldier in a holy war, and every leader is both general and high priest. You were taught that discipline is piety, victory is salvation, and the holiest act is to smite the enemies of the faith.

name: Scholarly Magocracy
description: Your society is governed by the most powerful mages. Political power is directly tied to arcane knowledge and magical might. You grew up surrounded by floating towers, enchanted constructs, and the belief that any problem, no matter how large, can be solved with the correct application of intellect and mana.

name: Decadent Merchant Republic
description: You were raised in a city-state ruled by powerful merchant families, where wealth dictates status. Your culture is one of lavish parties, cutthroat business deals, and political maneuvering through economic leverage. You learned early on that everything, and everyone, has a price.

name: Nomadic Clan Culture
description: You were born to a nomadic clan that roams the vast plains. Your culture values freedom above all else. You were taught that possessions are a burden, the open sky is your roof, and your loyalty is to your clan, not to any king or country. Strength, self-sufficiency, and a deep respect for the traditions of your ancestors are the pillars of your society.

name: Underground Kingdom
description: Your home is a city carved into the heart of a mountain. Your culture is one of craftsmanship, tradition, and grim determination. You were raised to respect the stone, to value the treasures of the earth, and to hold a grudge for a lifetime. The surface world is seen as a fleeting, dangerous place; true strength and beauty lie in the deep places of the earth.

name: Shadow Syndicate
description: You were raised in the embrace of a powerful criminal organization that secretly controls the city. Your culture is a web of secrets, unspoken rules, and ruthless pragmatism. You learned that there is the law of the land, and then there is the *real* law. Loyalty is everything, and betrayal is met with a swift and silent end.

name: Ancient Forest Conclave
description: Your people have lived in an ancient, enchanted forest for millennia, unseen by the outside world. Your culture is one of patience, secrecy, and a deep, magical connection to nature. You were taught that the forest itself is a living being and that your duty is to protect its balance from the short-sighted ambitions of the younger races.

name: Spartan War-State
description: You were raised in a society where the state comes before all else, and every citizen's worth is measured by their contribution to its military might. From a young age, you endured brutal training designed to forge you into a perfect soldier. Weakness is purged, emotion is a liability, and a beautiful death in battle is the highest honor.

name: Hedonistic Cult
description: You were brought up in a culture that worships beauty, pleasure, and personal freedom above all. Your society is one of grand art, passionate performances, and the constant pursuit of new sensations. You were taught that life is short and that to deny oneself of its pleasures is the only true sin. This often puts you at odds with more ascetic or disciplined cultures.

name: Post-Apocalyptic Survivors
description: Your people are the descendants of those who survived a great cataclysm that destroyed the old world. You were raised in a fortified settlement, surrounded by ruins and dangerous, mutated beasts. Your culture values scavenging, resourcefulness, and brutal pragmatism. You were taught that the old world's luxuries led to its downfall and that only the strong and clever survive in the new one.

name: Seafaring Raiders
description: You were born on the waves and raised on a longship. Your culture is one of raiding, exploration, and reverence for the sea and the storm. You were taught to read the winds, to navigate by the stars, and to take what you need from the weaker lands of the coast. For you, a settled life is a prison; true freedom is the salt spray on your face and a new horizon to conquer.

name: Isolationist Monks
description: You were raised in a secluded mountain monastery where the pursuit of perfection—of mind, body, and spirit—is the only goal. Your culture is one of extreme discipline, meditation, and martial arts training. You were taught to control your emotions, to endure any hardship without complaint, and that the greatest battle is the one fought against the self.

name: The Betrayed Mentor
description: Your greatest enemy was once your most trusted teacher. Master Valerius / Inquisitor Kael / General Zora taught you everything you know. Whether you betrayed them for a greater cause or they betrayed you for power, the line between student and master has been irrevocably broken, leaving a bitter and deeply personal rivalry. They know your techniques, your fears, and your weaknesses intimately.

name: The Childhood Rival
description: There has always been one person who has stood in your way: Lysander / Cassia / Roric. You grew up in the same town, competed for the same prizes, and vied for the same affections. Now, your childhood rivalry has escalated onto a larger stage. They seem to delight in thwarting your plans and take every opportunity to prove they are your superior, no matter the cost to others.

name: A Ruthless Noble House
description: Your path crossed with a powerful and vindictive noble family, the House of Blackwood / House Lancaster / House Volkov. Perhaps you slighted them, witnessed a crime, or simply stood in the way of their ambition. Now, their immense wealth, political influence, and network of assassins are a constant shadow in your life, waiting for a moment of weakness.

name: A Corrupt City Guard Captain
description: You ran afoul of Captain Valerius / Captain Anya / Captain Borin, a high-ranking member of the city watch who uses their badge to enrich themselves. You either refused to pay a bribe or witnessed their corruption firsthand. They now see you as a loose end and will use the full force of the law to hunt you down, branding you a criminal in the city they control.

name: A Fanatical Inquisitor
description: You have drawn the ire of High Inquisitor Malachi / Inquisitor Seraphina / Lord Inquisitor Theron, a zealot who sees heresy in every shadow. Perhaps you practice an unconventional form of magic, associate with 'unclean' creatures, or simply questioned their doctrine. They now hunt you with righteous fury, believing your death is a holy necessity.

name: A Cunning Thieves' Guild Master
description: You either double-crossed, stole from, or refused to join the local thieves' guild, earning the personal enmity of its master, 'The Shadow' / Madame Whisper / Silas the Scarred. They don't want you dead—not yet. They prefer to ruin you, using their network to sabotage your plans, steal your rewards, and turn your allies against you until you come crawling back for mercy.

name: A Cursed Artifact's Guardian
description: You possess or are hunting for a powerful artifact, but its ancient guardian, The Undying Sentinel / The Beast of the Mire / The Spirit of the Tomb, sees you as a defiler. This entity is bound to the artifact and will stop at nothing to reclaim it or protect its resting place, appearing at the most inopportune times to thwart you.

name: A Jilted Lover
description: A past romance ended badly, and your former lover, Lord Cassian / Lady Seraphina / Ronan the Blade, now harbors a deep and obsessive grudge. They are well-connected and respected, using their social standing to slander your name and turn public opinion against you while privately hiring thugs or assassins to make your life a living hell.

name: The Sole Survivor
description: In a past battle or raid, you and your allies wiped out a group of bandits, cultists, or soldiers. But one survived: Grak the Vengeful / Sister Elara / Sergeant Borin. They have spent every day since that event training for a single purpose: to hunt down and kill every person responsible, saving you for last.

name: A Greedy Merchant Prince
description: You interfered with the business of a powerful merchant prince named Silas Blackwater / Donatello / Lord Valerius. You may have disrupted their smuggling operation, protected a town they were exploiting, or outbid them on a valuable prize. They now see you as a liability to their profits and use their vast wealth to hire mercenaries and place bounties on your head.

name: Reckless Swing
description:
A wide, powerful swing that sacrifices accuracy for the chance to hit multiple foes.

In a timed scene, you use 'Reckless Swing'.

Reckless Swing

(Builder) When you spend 15 Rage to attack in a wide arc, roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD to up to three enemies in a frontal arc.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD to a single target, and half your HD to an adjacent one.
  • On a 1-8: You deal your HD to a single target but are Weakened for 1 round from the overextension.

name: Blood for Blood
description:
You intentionally wound yourself to fuel a devastating counter-attack.

In a timed scene, you use 'Blood for Blood'.

Blood for Blood

(Reaction) When an enemy hits you with a melee attack, you may take irreducible damage equal to your STR modifier and roll+CON.

  • On a 16+: Your next melee attack against that enemy this turn is a guaranteed High Hit (16+) and deals additional damage equal to the HP you sacrificed.
  • On a 9-15: Your next melee attack against that enemy this turn has advantage.
  • On a 1-8: You take the damage, but the pain clouds your focus; you have disadvantage on your next attack.

name: Overpower
description:
You use your raw strength to batter through an opponent's defense, permanently sundering their armor.

In a timed scene, you use 'Overpower'.

Overpower

When you attack a target with the intent to break their defenses, roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD. The target's Armor is permanently reduced by 2.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD, and the target's Armor is permanently reduced by 1.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your HD, but your weapon gets stuck, and you are Weakened for 1 round.

name: Execute
description:
You deliver a final, brutal blow to a wounded enemy, aiming to end the fight.

In a timed scene, you use 'Execute'.

Execute

(Finisher) When you target an enemy below half HP, you can spend 30 Rage.

You deal double your HD as physical damage. If this move defeats the target, you immediately regain 20 Rage. This move does not require a roll.

name: War Cry
description:
A deafening shout that bolsters allies and instills fear in enemies.

In a timed scene, you use 'War Cry'.

War Cry

When you spend an action to let out a war cry, roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: All allies within 3 squares gain 5 temporary HP, and all enemies within 3 squares are Frightened for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: You choose one: either all allies in range gain 5 temporary HP, or all enemies in range become Frightened for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: Your voice cracks under the strain. You are Weakened for 1 round.

name: Demoralizing Shout
description:
A ferocious bellow that saps the fighting spirit and physical prowess from your foes.

In a timed scene, you use 'Demoralizing Shout'.

Demoralizing Shout

When you spend an action to shout, roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: All enemies who can hear you within 3 squares are Weakened for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: All enemies within 3 squares are Weakened for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: You only manage to affect a single enemy within range, who is Weakened for 1 round.

name: Colossus Smash
description:
A mighty blow that shatters armor and defenses, leaving the target completely vulnerable.

In a timed scene, you use 'Colossus Smash'.

Colossus Smash

When you spend 25 Rage to make a devastating attack, roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD. For the next 2 rounds, the target's Armor is considered 0 against all attacks.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD. The next single attack against the target ignores their Armor.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your HD, but the force of the blow reverberates through you, leaving you Stunned for 1 round.

name: Dragon Roar
description:
You unleash a powerful roar that channels the fury of a dragon, spewing fire and force.

In a timed scene, you use 'Dragon Roar'.

Dragon Roar

When you spend 20 Rage to unleash a roar, roll+CON.

  • On a 16+: All enemies in a 4-square cone in front of you take your SD as magical (fire) damage and are Pushed 2.
  • On a 9-15: All enemies in the cone take half your SD and are Pushed 1.
  • On a 1-8: The roar is a choked gasp. You are Weakened for 1 round.

name: Hamstring
description:
A low, dirty slash aimed at crippling your opponent's movement, making escape impossible.

In a timed scene, you use 'Hamstring'.

Hamstring

When you attack an enemy's legs, roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: You deal half your HD. The target is Slowed for the rest of the combat unless magically healed.
  • On a 9-15: You deal half your HD, and the target is Slowed for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: You miss the leg and deal no damage, leaving you off-balance. The target has advantage on their next attack against you.

name: Sweeping Strikes
description:
You ready yourself for a flurry of attacks, allowing you to strike multiple opponents who get too close.

In a timed scene, you use 'Sweeping Strikes'.

Sweeping Strikes

When you spend your action and 10 Rage to take a wide stance, you gain an effect for 2 rounds.

For the next 2 rounds, whenever an enemy enters a square adjacent to you, you may use your reaction to make a single melee attack against them. You can only make one such reaction per turn.

name: Unending Rage
description:
Your anger is a bottomless well; it never truly fades between battles.

Unending Rage

(Passive)

You start every combat with 20 Rage. Your Rage no longer depletes at the end of combat.

name: Thick Skinned
description:
A lifetime of battle, training, and taking hits has hardened your hide to be like leather.

Thick Skinned

(Passive)

You have a permanent +1 bonus to your Armor. This stacks with any armor you are wearing.

name: Blood Craze
description:
The thrill of landing a powerful, decisive blow invigorates you and fuels your fury.

Blood Craze

(Passive)

Whenever you score a critical hit with a melee attack (a natural 20 on the d20 roll), you heal for an amount equal to your CON modifier (minimum 1) and immediately gain 10 Rage.

name: Juggernaut
description:
Once you start moving, your momentum makes you an unstoppable force of nature.

Juggernaut

(Passive)

You are immune to being Immobilized or Slowed by non-magical means. Additionally, whenever you use a Push ability, you may push the target 1 additional square.

name: Taste for Blood
description:
The sight and smell of a wounded enemy drives you into a focused, predatory frenzy.

Taste for Blood

(Passive)

You deal +2 damage with all melee attacks against enemies who are below half their maximum HP.

name: Pain Tolerance
description:
What would cripple others only serves to fuel your anger. The first hit is a wake-up call.

Pain Tolerance

(Passive)

The first time you take damage in a combat encounter, you immediately gain 15 Rage.

name: Brute Force
description:
You've learned that most problems, whether a locked door or a shielded enemy, can be solved by hitting them harder.

Brute Force

(Passive)

You have advantage on all STR rolls made to break inanimate objects. When your Hack & Slash attack is a Low Hit (1-8), you may choose to destroy the target's shield (if they have one), negating its Armor bonus for the rest of combat, instead of them gaining +3 forward against you.

name: Unstoppable Force
description:
Your charge is like that of a runaway boulder, making you incredibly difficult to harm while you build momentum.

Unstoppable Force

(Passive)

When you use the Charge feature, you gain +2 Armor until the start of your next turn.

name: Bloodied but Unbowed
description:
The closer you are to death's door, the more dangerous and desperate you become.

Bloodied but Unbowed

(Passive)

While you are below half of your maximum HP, all of your melee attacks deal an additional +2 damage.

name: Warbringer
description:
Your mere presence on the battlefield inspires a savage bloodlust and tactical ferocity in your allies.

Warbringer

(Passive)

When you successfully hit with a melee attack, you may choose one ally within 3 squares. That ally gains +3 forward on their next melee attack roll.

name: Sunfire
description:
You call down a burst of solar energy that sears your primary target and splashes to nearby foes, leaving them burning.

In a timed scene, you use 'Sunfire'.

Sunfire

When you attack a target within 8 squares with solar wrath, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The primary target takes your MD. The target and up to two other enemies within 2 squares are also Burning, taking 1d6 magical damage at the start of their next turn.
  • On a 9-15: The primary target takes your MD and is Burning for 1d6 magical damage.
  • On a 1-8: The solar flare is uncontrolled; you deal half your MD to the target, but also 1d4 damage to an ally adjacent to them.

name: Cyclone
description:
You conjure a miniature cyclone to lift an enemy off the ground, making them helpless for a short time.

In a timed scene, you use 'Cyclone'.

Cyclone

When you target an enemy within 6 squares, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The target is caught in a cyclone for 2 rounds. They are lifted 1 square in the air, are Stunned, and cannot be targeted by attacks.
  • On a 9-15: The effect lasts for only 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The cyclone is unstable. The target is only Weakened for 1 round.

name: Tranquility
description:
You enter a meditative state, channeling a wave of profound peace and healing over your allies.

In a timed scene, you use 'Tranquility'.

Tranquility

When you spend your action and 3 MP to channel a wave of healing, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You and up to three allies you can see heal for your MD. You can continue to channel this as your action each turn, granting the same healing without a new roll for up to 3 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: You and up to two allies heal for your MD. You can continue to channel next turn.
  • On a 1-8: The healing is unfocused. You and one ally heal for half your MD, and the channel ends.

name: Force of Nature
description:
You summon spirits of the forest to temporarily inhabit nearby trees, creating loyal but short-lived defenders.

In a timed scene, you use 'Force of Nature'.

Force of Nature

When you spend an action and 2 MP to animate nature, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You summon two Treants in empty squares within 5 squares. They last for 3 rounds, have 10 HP, and their basic attack deals 1d8 HD.
  • On a 9-15: You summon one Treant that lasts for 3 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The summoning is weak. You summon one Treant, but it only has 5 HP and lasts for 1 round.

name: Starfall
description:
You call down a shower of stars over an area, searing any enemies who pass through the celestial rain.

In a timed scene, you use 'Starfall'.

Starfall

When you spend your action and 3 MP, choose a 3x3 square area within 8 squares. Roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The area is showered with stars for 3 rounds. Any enemy who starts their turn in the area takes half your MD as magical damage and is Weakened for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: The starfall lasts for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The starfall lasts for 2 rounds, but its area is difficult terrain for everyone, including allies.

name: Wild Growth
description:
You cause a burst of life-giving energy to erupt from a target, healing them and nearby allies.

In a timed scene, you use 'Wild Growth'.

Wild Growth

When you target an ally within 8 squares, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: Your target heals for your MD. Up to two other allies within 3 squares of them heal for half that amount.
  • On a 9-15: Your target heals for your MD, and one other ally within 3 squares heals for half that amount.
  • On a 1-8: Your target heals for your MD, but the energy is drawn from you; you take 1d6 damage.

name: Solar Beam
description:
You summon a concentrated beam of intense solar light to silence and scorch a foe.

In a timed scene, you use 'Solar Beam'.

Solar Beam

When you target an enemy within 7 squares, spend 2 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The target takes your MD. If their WIS is less than your INT, they are also Deafened and unable to cast spells for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: The target takes your MD and is unable to cast spells for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The beam is weak and only deals half your MD.

name: Ursol's Vortex
description:
You create a swirling vortex of wind at a location, pulling enemies into the center and hindering their escape.

In a timed scene, you use 'Ursol's Vortex'.

Ursol's Vortex

When you spend your action and 2 MP, choose an empty square within 6 squares. Roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: A 3-square radius vortex appears for 2 rounds. All enemies in the area are immediately Pulled 2 towards the center. The area is difficult terrain.
  • On a 9-15: The vortex appears and immediately inflicts Pull 1 on all enemies within it. The effect then ends.
  • On a 1-8: The vortex is unstable. It appears and inflicts Pull 1 on all creatures, including allies.

name: Hibernate
description:
You force a beast or dragonkin into a magical slumber, pacifying them as long as they are not disturbed.

In a timed scene, you use 'Hibernate'.

Hibernate

When you attempt to put a Beast or Dragonkin to sleep within 6 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The target falls into a deep slumber for up to one minute. The effect breaks if they take any damage.
  • On a 9-15: The sleep is fitful and lasts for only 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The spell fails, and the creature is enraged, gaining +3 forward against you on its next turn.

name: Stampeding Roar
description:
You let out a primal roar that inspires a burst of speed in your allies, allowing them to reposition swiftly.

In a timed scene, you use 'Stampeding Roar'.

Stampeding Roar

When you spend your action and 1 SP to roar, roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: You and all allies within a 5-square radius may immediately use a free Move action at double their SPEED.
  • On a 9-15: You and all allies within 3 squares may immediately use a free Move action.
  • On a 1-8: Only you are inspired, and may immediately use a free Move action.

name: Ysera's Gift
description:
The essence of the Emerald Dream suffuses your being, passively mending wounds on you or your allies.

Ysera's Gift

(Passive)

At the start of your turn, if you are below your maximum HP, you heal for an amount equal to your WIS modifier (minimum 1). If you are at full HP, the most injured ally within 3 squares heals for that amount instead.

name: Living Seed
description:
Your most potent heals plant a seed of life, offering a burst of healing when it is needed most.

Living Seed

(Passive)

When you cast a healing spell on an ally and the result is a High Hit (16+), you plant a Living Seed on them. The next time that ally takes damage, the seed is consumed and they immediately heal for an amount equal to your MD.

name: Master Shapeshifter
description:
Your command over your animal forms is absolute, allowing you to blend magic and might seamlessly.

Master Shapeshifter

(Passive)

The MP cost of your Wild Shape feature is reduced to 0. Additionally, you may cast healing spells that only affect yourself (like Rejuvenation) while in a Wild Shape form.

name: Omen of Clarity
description:
Your connection to nature allows you to occasionally act with perfect, effortless clarity, conserving your magical energy.

Omen of Clarity

(Passive)

At the start of your turn, roll a d6. On a 6, you enter a state of Clearcasting. The next spell you cast this turn that costs MP costs 0 MP instead.

name: Gift of the Earthmother
description:
Your bond with the living earth infuses you with its resilience and vitality.

Gift of the Earthmother

(Passive)

Your maximum HP is permanently increased by an amount equal to your COS modifier + 5.

name: Soothing Naturalist
description:
Your healing magic is infused with nature's purifying essence, cleansing afflictions as it mends flesh.

Soothing Naturalist

(Passive)

Whenever you cast a healing spell on an ally that restores HP, roll a d6. On a 5 or 6, you may also remove one Poisoned or disease condition from that ally.

name: Thorns
description:
You surround yourself or an ally with a magical aura of sharp thorns that retaliate against attackers.

Thorns

(Passive)

You may have a magical Thorns aura active on yourself or one ally within 5 squares at all times. Whenever the warded character is hit by a melee attack, the attacker takes 1d4 damage. You may switch who the aura is on as a free action on your turn.

name: One with Nature
description:
Your senses and movements become one with the wilds, allowing you to move through the most difficult terrain with ease.

One with Nature

(Passive)

You are immune to the movement penalties of non-magical difficult terrain (like undergrowth, rubble, or mud). Additionally, when you attempt to hide in a natural environment, you have advantage on your roll.

name: Nature's Swiftness
description:
You have learned to cast your spells in harmony with your movements, weaving your magic without breaking stride.

Nature's Swiftness

(Passive)

You may cast spells that have a casting time of one action while moving. Your movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity from enemies that are currently affected by one of your ongoing spells (like Entangling Roots or Moonfire).

name: Blessing of the Ancients
description:
You are blessed by the timeless spirits of the forest, granting you a portion of their immense resilience.

Blessing of the Ancients

(Passive)

When you are hit by a critical hit (a natural 20 on the d20 roll), the attack is treated as a normal hit instead. This effect can only occur once per combat.

name: Garrote
description:
You ambush a target from stealth, attempting to choke them into silence.

In a timed scene, you use 'Garrote' while Invisible or hidden.

Garrote

When you attack an unaware humanoid from behind, roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD. The target is Deafened and unable to cast spells for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD. The target is Deafened for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: You only deal half your HD, and the target immediately alerts their allies to your position.

name: Hemorrhage
description:
A vicious slash that opens a deep wound, causing the target to bleed profusely over time.

This is a finisher that spends Combo Points.

Hemorrhage

(Finisher) When you have at least 1 Combo Point on a target, you can use your action and spend all points.

You deal no initial damage. The target is Bleeding for a number of rounds equal to the Combo Points spent. The bleed deals 1d6 damage at the start of their turn. This move does not require a roll.

name: Blind
description:
You throw a pocketful of sand or blinding powder into an enemy's face, temporarily robbing them of their sight.

In a timed scene, you use 'Blind'.

Blind

When you use your action to blind an adjacent enemy, roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: The powder hits perfectly. If the target's CON is less than your DEX, they are Blinded for 2 rounds. Otherwise, they are Blinded for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: The target is Blinded for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The wind blows the powder back in your face. You are Blinded for 1 round.

name: Animate Dead
description:
You use foul necromancy to raise a recently slain humanoid as a mindless skeletal servant.

In a timed scene, you use 'Animate Dead' on a corpse.

Animate Dead

When you spend an action and 2 MP to touch a humanoid corpse, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You raise a Skeleton with 10 HP. It lasts for 3 rounds and follows your commands, dealing 1d6 HD with its basic attack.
  • On a 9-15: You raise a Skeleton, but it is fragile and only has 5 HP.
  • On a 1-8: The ritual fails. The corpse's spirit lashes out, dealing 1d6 magical damage to you.

name: Sap
description:
A carefully aimed, non-lethal blow to the head, designed to knock an opponent out cold without raising an alarm.

In a timed scene, you use 'Sap' while Invisible or hidden.

Sap

When you attack an unaware humanoid from behind, roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You knock the target out. They are Stunned for 3 rounds. This effect breaks if they take any damage.
  • On a 9-15: The target is Stunned for only 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: Your blow is clumsy. You deal half your HD, and the target is not stunned, immediately shouting for help.

name: Cloak of Shadows
description:
You wrap yourself in pure shadow, becoming temporarily immune to hostile magic and purging existing effects.

In a timed scene, you use 'Cloak of Shadows'.

Cloak of Shadows

When you spend your action and 2 SP to magically cloak yourself, roll+CON.

  • On a 16+: You immediately remove all hostile magical effects from yourself and become immune to them for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: You become immune to hostile magical effects for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The cloak is unstable. You remove one magical effect, but take 1d6 magical damage in the process.

name: Death Coil
description:
You launch a bolt of necrotic energy that harms the living and invigorates the dead.

In a timed scene, you use 'Death Coil'.

Death Coil

When you attack a target within 6 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD as necrotic damage. If the target is Undead, it heals for that amount instead.
  • On a 9-15: You deal half your MD (or heal for half).
  • On a 1-8: The unholy energy backlashes, dealing 1d4 necrotic damage to you.

name: Marked for Death
description:
You place a shadowy mark on a target, designating them as your prey and making them exceptionally vulnerable to your finishing moves.

In a timed scene, you use 'Marked for Death'.

Marked for Death

When you spend an action to mark an enemy within 8 squares, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The target is marked for 3 rounds. Any Finisher you use on the target during this time is treated as if you had spent the maximum number of Combo Points (e.g., 5), regardless of how many you actually have. The mark is consumed when a Finisher is used.
  • On a 9-15: The mark lasts for only 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The mark alerts the target to your malice. They gain +3 forward on their next action against you.

name: Distract
description:
You throw a rock or make a noise to cause a momentary distraction, creating an opening for you or an ally.

In a timed scene, you use 'Distract'.

Distract

When you spend an action to create a diversion, choose a target within 6 squares and roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: The target is distracted until the end of your turn. You and one ally may immediately attempt a Stealth roll with advantage.
  • On a 9-15: The target is distracted. You may attempt a Stealth roll with advantage.
  • On a 1-8: The distraction is obvious and draws the target's attention directly to you.

name: Curse of Exhaustion
description:
You place a debilitating curse on an enemy, sapping their speed and stamina.

In a timed scene, you use 'Curse of Exhaustion'.

Curse of Exhaustion

When you curse an enemy within 7 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The target is cursed. For 2 rounds, they are Slowed and cannot take Reactions.
  • On a 9-15: The target is Slowed for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The curse is weak and only Slows the target for 1 round.

name: Lethality
description:
You are a master of finding and exploiting weak points in your enemy's armor.

Lethality

(Passive)

All of your melee attacks ignore 1 point of the target's Armor. When you score a critical hit, you deal an additional 1d8 damage.

name: Fleet Footed
description:
You move with a preternatural quickness, allowing you to easily outpace your foes.

Fleet Footed

(Passive)

Your base SPEED is permanently increased by 2.

name: From the Shadows
description:
Your opening attack from the shadows is particularly devastating, catching your opponent completely off guard.

From the Shadows

(Passive)

The first attack you make in a combat encounter while Invisible or hidden from your target deals an additional +5 damage.

name: Vile Poisons
description:
You have mastered the art of brewing and applying toxins that are exceptionally potent and difficult to resist.

Vile Poisons

(Passive)

All damage dealt by any Poisoned condition you apply is increased by +2 per round. Enemies have disadvantage on rolls to resist your poisons.

name: Relentless Strikes
description:
Your flurry of attacks is a dizzying assault that builds momentum with astonishing speed.

Relentless Strikes

(Passive)

When you use a Builder move that generates Combo Points, roll a d6. On a 5 or 6, you generate one additional Combo Point.

name: Master of Deception
description:
Lies and disguises are your art form. You can weave a believable falsehood as easily as others breathe.

Master of Deception

(Passive)

You have advantage on all CHA rolls made to lie, bluff, or maintain a disguise.

name: Siphoning Strikes
description:
Your strikes are imbued with a subtle vampiric magic, draining your opponent's vitality to restore your own.

Siphoning Strikes

(Passive)

Whenever you deal HD with a melee weapon, you heal for an amount equal to your INT modifier (minimum 1).

name: Shadow's Resilience
description:
You have grown accustomed to the lingering pain of curses and poisons, allowing you to shrug off their worst effects.

Shadow's Resilience

(Passive)

You take half damage from all damage-over-time effects, such as Poisoned, Bleeding, or Burning.

name: Dirty Tricks
description:
You fight without honor, and your cheap shots are brutally effective.

Dirty Tricks

(Passive)

Whenever you successfully inflict the Stunned, Blinded, or Deafened condition on an enemy, the duration of that condition is increased by 1 round.

name: Ghostly Strike
description:
Your blade flickers between the material world and the shadow plane, allowing it to slip through physical defenses.

Ghostly Strike

(Passive)

When you make a melee attack, roll a d6. On a 6, your attack is a Ghostly Strike and completely ignores the target's Armor.

name: Maul
description:
A savage, crushing blow with your claws that expends your fury to tear through the enemy.

This move can only be used in Bear Form.

Maul

When you attack an enemy in melee, you can spend up to 30 Rage and roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD, plus an additional +1 damage for every 5 Rage spent. This attack ignores 1 point of Armor.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD, plus an additional +1 damage for every 5 Rage spent.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your HD, but the wild swing leaves you open; the enemy gains +3 forward against you.

name: Incapacitating Roar
description:
You let loose a deafening roar that disorients and incapacitates all nearby enemies.

This move can only be used in Bear Form.

Incapacitating Roar

When you spend an action to roar, roll+CON.

  • On a 16+: All enemies within a 2-square radius are affected. If an enemy's WIS is less than your STR, they are Stunned for 1 round. Otherwise, they are Weakened for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: All adjacent enemies are Weakened for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The roar catches in your throat, leaving you Weakened for 1 round.

name: Frenzied Regeneration
description:
You tap into your primal connection to life, rapidly healing grievous wounds in the heat of battle.

This move can only be used in Bear Form.

Frenzied Regeneration

When you are below half your maximum HP, you can use your action and spend 30 Rage. Roll+CON.

  • On a 16+: You heal for an amount equal to your maximum HP. You can only use this ability once per day.
  • On a 9-15: You heal for an amount equal to half your maximum HP.
  • On a 1-8: You heal for an amount equal to your CON score + 5.

name: Skull Bash
description:
You charge a short distance to deliver a brutal headbutt, interrupting spellcasters with pure concussive force.

This move can only be used in Bear Form.

Skull Bash

(Reaction) When an enemy within 4 squares begins to cast a spell, you can spend your reaction and 10 Rage to charge and attack them. Roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You move adjacent to the target. The spell is interrupted and fails, and they are Stunned for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: You move adjacent to the target and interrupt the spell.
  • On a 1-8: You interrupt the spell, but the magical backlash deals 1d6 magical damage to you.

name: Thrash
description:
You flail wildly with your claws, tearing into all nearby enemies and leaving them with bleeding wounds.

This move can only be used in Bear Form.

Thrash

When you spend an action to attack all adjacent enemies, spend 15 Rage and roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You deal half your HD to all adjacent enemies, and they are all Bleeding for 1d4 damage for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: You deal half your HD to all adjacent enemies.
  • On a 1-8: You become dizzy from the wild swinging and are Weakened for 1 round.

name: Thick Hide
description:
Your bear form is exceptionally tough, with a hide as thick as ancient bark and leather.

Thick Hide

(Passive)

While in Bear Form, you gain a permanent +1 bonus to your Armor. Additionally, all physical damage you take from non-magical sources is reduced by 1.

name: Gore
description:
Your critical strikes in bear form are particularly savage, tearing open grievous wounds that bleed profusely.

Gore

(Passive)

When you score a critical hit with a melee attack while in Bear Form (a natural 20 on the d20 roll), the target is also afflicted with a deep wound. They are Bleeding for an amount equal to your STR modifier (minimum 1) for 3 rounds.

name: Survival of the Fittest
description:
As you take damage, your primal instincts sharpen, making you an even more resilient and dangerous opponent.

Survival of the Fittest

(Passive)

While you are below half of your maximum HP in Bear Form, you gain +1 Armor and all Rage you generate from any source is increased by 5.

name: Guardian's Presence
description:
Your intimidating size and protective nature in Bear Form make enemies think twice before turning their backs on you.

Guardian's Presence

(Passive)

While in Bear Form, all enemies adjacent to you have disadvantage on Attack of Opportunity rolls made against your allies.

name: Brutal Impact
description:
The sheer force of your blows in bear form can stagger and daze your opponents.

Brutal Impact

(Passive)

When you get a High Hit (16+) on a Hack & Slash attack while in Bear Form, you may choose to forgo the extra benefit of the hit. If you do, the target is Stunned for 1 round.

name: Consecration
description:
You sanctify the ground beneath your feet, creating a holy area that burns your enemies.

In a timed scene, you use 'Consecration'.

Consecration

When you spend your action and 1 MP to sanctify the ground, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You create a 3-square radius area of consecrated ground centered on you. It lasts for 3 rounds. Any enemy who starts their turn in the area takes 1d6 magical damage.
  • On a 9-15: The area lasts for 2 rounds and has a 2-square radius.
  • On a 1-8: The consecration is weak, lasting only 1 round in a 2-square radius.

name: Judgment
description:
You hurl a magical hammer of judgment at an enemy, marking them as a target for divine wrath.

In a timed scene, you use 'Judgment'.

Judgment

When you attack a target within 8 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The target takes your MD and is marked with Judgment for 2 rounds. All further damage you deal to the target with Blue features is increased by +3.
  • On a 9-15: The target takes your MD and is marked with Judgment for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The target takes half your MD and is not marked.

name: Avenger's Shield
description:
You hurl your shield, imbued with holy energy, to strike multiple foes before it ricochets back to you.

This move requires a shield to be equipped.

Avenger's Shield

When you throw your shield at a target within 6 squares, spend 1 SP and roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD to the primary target. The shield then bounces to up to two other enemies within 3 squares, dealing half your HD to each before returning to your hand.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD to the primary target, and it bounces to one other enemy for half HD.
  • On a 1-8: You only hit your primary target for half HD, and the shield clatters to the ground in their square.

name: Lay on Hands
description:
You channel the Light into a single, powerful act of healing, capable of bringing someone back from the brink of death.

In a timed scene, you use 'Lay on Hands'.

Lay on Hands

Once per day, when you use your action to touch a creature, roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: You heal the target for an amount equal to your maximum HP. All of their physical and magical ailments are cured.
  • On a 9-15: You heal the target for an amount equal to half your maximum HP.
  • On a 1-8: You heal the target for an amount equal to your CHA modifier + 10.

name: Divine Shield
description:
You surround yourself with a barrier of holy light, becoming completely immune to all harm for a short time.

In a timed scene, you use 'Divine Shield'.

Divine Shield

Once per day, when you spend your action to create a shield, roll+CON.

  • On a 16+: You become immune to all damage and hostile effects for 2 rounds. You cannot attack or cast hostile spells while this is active.
  • On a 9-15: The effect lasts for only 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The shield is unstable. It grants you immunity for 1 round, but you are Stunned for your following turn when it expires.

name: Rebuke
description:
You issue a sharp, holy command to interrupt a spellcaster's incantation.

In a timed scene, you use 'Rebuke'.

Rebuke

(Reaction) When an enemy within 3 squares begins to cast a spell, you can spend your reaction to shout. Roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: The spell is interrupted and fails. The caster is Deafened for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: The spell is interrupted and fails.
  • On a 1-8: You interrupt the spell, but the backlash deals 1d4 magical damage to you.

name: Shield of the Righteous
description:
You bash a foe with your shield, releasing a wave of holy energy that bolsters your defenses.

This move requires a shield to be equipped.

Shield of the Righteous

When you attack an enemy in melee with your shield, spend 1 SP and roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD as magical damage. You gain +2 Armor for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD and gain +1 Armor for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half HD, but the jarring impact leaves you Weakened for 1 round.

name: Exorcism
description:
You channel pure holy power to cast out an unholy spirit, dealing massive damage to Undead and Demons.

This move can only be used on Undead or Demonic creatures.

Exorcism

When you attack an unholy target within 7 squares, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD + 10 as magical damage.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD + 5.
  • On a 1-8: The unholy creature resists; you only deal your MD.

name: Word of Glory
description:
You speak a divine word that mends wounds, channeling your social and spiritual energy into a burst of healing.

In a timed scene, you use 'Word of Glory'.

Word of Glory

When you spend an action to heal a target you can touch, you may spend up to 3 SP. Roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: The target heals 1d8 HP, plus an additional 1d8 for each SP spent.
  • On a 9-15: The target heals 1d6 HP, plus an additional 1d6 for each SP spent.
  • On a 1-8: The target heals 1d6 HP. Any SP spent are wasted.

name: Sentinel
description:
You take a guarded stance, ready to strike any foe foolish enough to approach your position.

In a timed scene, you use 'Sentinel'.

Sentinel

When you spend your action to take a defensive stance, you gain an effect for 2 rounds.

For the next 2 rounds, you cannot use your Movement. Whenever an enemy willingly enters a square adjacent to you, you may use your reaction to make a single melee attack against them.

name: Retribution Aura
description:
An aura of holy vengeance surrounds you, punishing those who dare to strike you or your nearby allies.

Retribution Aura

(Passive)

You may only have one Aura active at a time. While this aura is active, whenever an enemy hits you or an ally within 2 squares with a melee attack, the attacker takes 1d4 magical damage.

name: Bulwark of Faith
description:
Your unwavering faith acts as a constant shield, lessening the impact of all blows.

Bulwark of Faith

(Passive)

All damage you take from any source is reduced by 1.

name: Ardent Defender
description:
Your instinct to protect your allies is so strong that their peril becomes your strength.

Ardent Defender

(Passive)

Whenever an adjacent ally takes damage from an attack, you gain 5 temporary HP. This can only occur once per round.

name: Hallowed Ground
description:
The holy energy of your Consecration now soothes and mends the wounds of your allies.

Hallowed Ground

(Passive)

Your Consecration feature is empowered. Allies who start their turn inside your Consecration now heal for 1d6 HP.

name: Unwavering Spirit
description:
You stand firm as a beacon of order, refusing to be moved by physical force.

Unwavering Spirit

(Passive)

You have advantage on all rolls to resist being moved by a Push, Pull, or Crush effect.

name: Vindication
description:
Striking down your foes with righteous fury restores the vitality of you and your allies.

Vindication

(Passive)

When you defeat an enemy, you and one ally of your choice within 3 squares immediately heal for an amount equal to your CHA modifier (minimum 1) + 5.

name: The Light's Chosen
description:
The Light has chosen you as its champion, and it will not let you fall so easily.

The Light's Chosen

(Passive)

Once per day, when an attack would reduce you to 0 HP, you are instead left with 1 HP.

name: Shielding Words
description:
Your healing spells are accompanied by words of encouragement that form a protective barrier on your allies.

Shielding Words

(Passive)

Whenever you cast a spell that restores an ally's HP, that ally also gains temporary HP equal to your CHA modifier (minimum 1).

name: Swift Crusader
description:
Your divine steed is empowered by your faith, galloping across the battlefield with unparalleled speed and grace.

Swift Crusader

(Passive)

Your Divine Steed feature lasts for 1 additional round. While Divine Steed is active, you are also immune to all Slowed and Immobilized effects.

name: Grand Crusader
description:
When you successfully defend against an attack, the Light grants you a surge of righteous power.

Grand Crusader

(Passive)

When you successfully use the Defend action to halve or redirect an attack, or when you use a Reaction to block an attack (like Shield Block), you gain +3 forward on your next attack roll.

name: Lava Burst
description:
You hurl a glob of molten lava at an enemy, a powerful elemental blast that can sometimes be cast with incredible speed.

In a timed scene, you use 'Lava Burst'.

Lava Burst

When you attack a target within 8 squares with molten earth, spend 2 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD + 5 as magical (fire) damage. Your next Lava Burst this combat becomes instant (free action).
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD + 5 as magical (fire) damage.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your MD, and the heat backfires, making you Weakened for 1 round.

name: Earthquake
description:
You cause the very ground to tremble and crack in a targeted area, knocking foes from their feet.

In a timed scene, you use 'Earthquake'.

Earthquake

When you spend your action and 3 MP to shatter the earth, choose a 3x3 square area within 6 squares. Roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The earthquake rages for 3 rounds. The area becomes difficult terrain. Any enemy who starts their turn in the area must roll+DEX or be knocked prone.
  • On a 9-15: The earthquake lasts for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The quake is brief, lasting only 1 round and affecting a 2x2 area.

name: Wind Shear
description:
A quick blast of wind you can use to disrupt enemy spellcasters from a distance.

In a timed scene, you use 'Wind Shear'.

Wind Shear

(Reaction) When an enemy you can see within 8 squares begins to cast a spell, you can spend your reaction and 1 MP to attack them with wind. Roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The spell is interrupted and fails. You also deal 1d6 magical damage.
  • On a 9-15: The spell is interrupted and fails.
  • On a 1-8: The spell is interrupted, but the chaotic energy makes you Weakened for 1 round.

name: Chain Lightning
description:
You unleash a bolt of lightning that leaps from one target to the next, shocking multiple foes.

In a timed scene, you use 'Chain Lightning'.

Chain Lightning

When you attack a target within 7 squares, spend 2 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD as magical damage to the primary target. The lightning then arcs to up to two other enemies within 3 squares of the previous target, dealing half your MD to each.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD to the primary target, and it arcs to one other enemy for half your MD.
  • On a 1-8: The lightning only hits your primary target for half your MD.

name: Hex
description:
You perform a shamanistic curse, transforming an enemy into a harmless creature, like a frog or a snake.

In a timed scene, you use 'Hex'.

Hex

When you attempt to transform an enemy within 6 squares, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The target is transformed into a harmless frog for 2 rounds. In this form, they cannot attack or cast spells. The effect breaks if they take any damage.
  • On a 9-15: The transformation lasts for only 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The spell backfires, transforming you into a frog for 1 round.

name: Bloodlust
description:
You incite a primal frenzy in an ally, granting them a burst of incredible speed and power.

In a timed scene, you use 'Bloodlust'.

Bloodlust

Once per day, when you spend your action and 3 MP to inspire an ally within 5 squares, roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: The target immediately gains an extra Action this round and deals +3 damage on all their attacks for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: The target immediately gains an extra Action this round.
  • On a 1-8: The frenzy is too much. The target gains an extra action, but they are Confused for their entire next turn.

name: Spirit Link Totem
description:
You place a totem that creates a spiritual bond between your allies, evenly distributing their vitality and pain.

In a timed scene, you use 'Spirit Link Totem'.

Spirit Link Totem

When you place a totem in an adjacent empty square, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The totem lasts for 3 rounds. At the end of your turn, the HP of all allies within a 3-square radius is redistributed evenly among them.
  • On a 9-15: The totem lasts for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The totem links friend and foe alike, redistributing the HP of all creatures in the radius.

name: Demolition Charge
description:
You plant a powerful, timed explosive designed to bring down walls or deal massive area damage.

In a timed scene, you use 'Demolition Charge'.

Demolition Charge

When you spend an action to place a charge in an adjacent empty square, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The charge is set. At the start of your next turn, it explodes, dealing 2d8 fire damage to all creatures in a 3-square radius and destroying non-magical structures.
  • On a 9-15: The charge explodes, but only deals 2d8 fire damage in a 2-square radius.
  • On a 1-8: The fuse is faulty! It explodes immediately, dealing 2d8 fire damage centered on your square.

name: Primal Strike
description:
You imbue your weapon with the raw power of the elements for a single, savage blow.

In a timed scene, you use 'Primal Strike'.

Primal Strike

When you make a melee attack, you can spend 1 SP and roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: Your attack deals its normal HD, plus an additional 1d8 magical damage. You may also Push 1 the target.
  • On a 9-15: Your attack deals an additional 1d8 magical damage.
  • On a 1-8: Your attack deals its normal HD, but the elemental energy feedback leaves you Weakened for 1 round.

name: Magma Totem
description:
You summon a totem that erupts with pulses of searing magma, burning nearby enemies.

In a timed scene, you use 'Magma Totem'.

Magma Totem

When you place a totem in an adjacent empty square, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The totem lasts for 3 rounds. At the end of your turn, it deals half your MD as fire damage to all enemies within a 2-square radius.
  • On a 9-15: The totem lasts for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The totem is unstable and immediately explodes, dealing 1d6 fire damage to all creatures (including allies) in adjacent squares.

name: Elemental Attunement
description:
Your connection to the elements is profound, allowing you to weave them into your every action.

Elemental Attunement

(Passive)

When you successfully deal HD with a melee weapon, your next spell that deals magical damage this combat deals an additional +3 damage. This effect can only occur once per round.

name: Ancestral Vigor
description:
The strength of your ancestors flows through your veins, granting you exceptional hardiness.

Ancestral Vigor

(Passive)

Your maximum HP is permanently increased by an amount equal to your CON modifier + 5.

name: Unleash Elements
description:
Your melee attacks are so forceful they crackle with latent elemental power.

Unleash Elements

(Passive)

When you score a critical hit with a melee attack (a natural 20 on the d20 roll), the target is also affected by a random elemental surge. Roll a d4: 1-Earth (Push 1), 2-Fire (Burning for 1d4 for 1 round), 3-Wind (Weakened for 1 round), 4-Water (Slowed for 1 round).

name: Toughness
description:
A lifetime of hardship, battle, or simply being a nomad has made you incredibly resilient to physical harm.

Toughness

(Passive)

All physical damage you take from non-magical sources (HD) is reduced by 2.

name: Spiritual Grace
description:
Your communion with the spirits allows you to remain mobile while performing your shamanistic rites.

Spiritual Grace

(Passive)

After you successfully use an action to place a Totem, you may immediately use a free Move action at half your SPEED. This movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Recklessness
description:
You throw caution to the wind, trading defense for pure, unadulterated offensive power.

Recklessness

(Passive)

At the start of your turn, you can choose to become Reckless. If you do, you gain a +3 bonus to all damage rolls until your next turn, but all attacks against you have advantage.

name: Stormbringer
description:
Your presence is like a storm front, crackling with energy that empowers your allies' weapons.

Stormbringer

(Passive)

Allies within a 3-square radius of you (including yourself) deal an additional +1 magical (lightning) damage with all their successful melee attacks.

name: Shamanistic Rage
description:
Pain does not deter you; it focuses your elemental power, drawing the spirits to your aid.

Shamanistic Rage

(Passive)

Whenever you take damage from an attack, you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon (max 5). You can spend 5 stacks to make your next magical attack instant and deal +3 damage.

name: Volatile Engineering
description:
Your explosives are a testament to goblin ingenuity: bigger, louder, and delightfully unpredictable.

Volatile Engineering

(Passive)

Whenever you use an ability that deals fire damage from an explosive device (like Copper Bomb or Demolition Charge), roll a d6. On a 5 or 6, the damage is increased by +5. On a 1, the explosion's radius is increased by 1 square, affecting all creatures in the new area (including allies).

name: Ride the Lightning
description:
You have learned to transform into a being of pure energy, striking an enemy and reforming in their place.

Ride the Lightning

(Passive)

When you successfully hit with a spell that deals lightning damage, you may choose to spend 1 MP. If you do, you instantly Shift to the target's original square, and the target is Pushed 1 into an adjacent empty square of your choice.

name: Arcane Shot
description:
You fire a magical arrow that hums with arcane energy, dealing damage and helping you focus your next shot.

This is a Focus generator.

Arcane Shot

(Builder) When you attack with a ranged weapon, you may spend 1 MP to roll+INT instead of DEX.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD and generate 30 Focus.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD and generate 20 Focus.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your MD and generate 10 Focus.

name: Chimaera Shot
description:
You fire a magical, two-headed arrow that strikes a target with both natural and arcane energy.

This move uses Focus.

Chimaera Shot

When you attack a target, spend 30 Focus and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The target takes your HD (Nature) and your MD (Frost). The Frost damage also Slows them for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: The target takes your HD (Nature) and your MD (Frost).
  • On a 1-8: The two heads of the shot separate, hitting two random targets (friend or foe) near your primary target for half damage each.

name: Trueshot
description:
You enter a state of perfect focus, seeing nothing but your targets and unleashing a volley of shots with supernatural speed.

In a timed scene, you use 'Trueshot'.

Trueshot

Once per day, when you spend your action and 40 Focus, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: For the next 3 rounds, all your Focus-generating shots generate double the Focus.
  • On a 9-15: The effect lasts for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The intense focus is draining. The effect lasts 2 rounds, but you are Stunned for 1 round when it ends.

name: Careful Aim
description:
Patience is the ultimate virtue of the marksman. By remaining stationary, your shots become significantly more lethal.

Careful Aim

(Passive)

At the start of your turn, if you did not use your Movement on your previous turn, you gain a stack of Careful Aim (max 3). Your next Volley or Aimed Shot attack deals an additional +2 damage for each stack and consumes all stacks.

name: Piercing Shots
description:
Your arcane-infused arrows are capable of slipping through the gaps in armor, or simply punching right through it.

Piercing Shots

(Passive)

All of your ranged attacks with bows or crossbows ignore 1 point of the target's Armor.

name: Lone Wolf
description:
You hunt best when unburdened by a companion, your focus entirely on the prey.

Lone Wolf

(Passive)

If you do not have an Animal Companion in your Active Deck, all damage you deal with ranged weapons is increased by +3.

name: Lacerate
description:
A vicious melee strike that tears open a deep, bleeding wound on your target.

In a timed scene, you use 'Lacerate'.

Lacerate

When you attack an adjacent enemy in melee, roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD, and the target is Bleeding for 1d8 damage for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD, and the target is Bleeding for 1d6 damage for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your HD, and the bleed is minor, lasting only 1 round.

name: Explosive Trap
description:
You place a proximity trap that explodes with fiery force when an enemy approaches.

In a timed scene, you use 'Explosive Trap'.

Explosive Trap

When you spend an action to place a trap in an empty adjacent square, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The trap is set. The first enemy to enter the square triggers an explosion, dealing 1d10 fire damage to them and all adjacent creatures. All targets are also set Ablaze for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: The trap deals 1d10 fire damage only to the creature that triggered it.
  • On a 1-8: The trap is a dud. It makes a loud *clank* but does not explode, revealing its position.

name: Raptor Strike
description:
A swift and vicious melee strike that you can weave between other attacks.

This is a Focus generator.

Raptor Strike

(Builder) When you attack an enemy in melee, roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD and generate 20 Focus.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD and generate 15 Focus.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your HD and generate 10 Focus.

name: Mongoose Bite
description:
A ferocious bite that becomes more savage with each successive attack.

This move uses Focus.

Mongoose Bite

When you attack an enemy in melee, spend 20 Focus and roll+STR. If you have attacked this same target with Mongoose Bite within the last round, this attack deals +3 damage, stacking up to 3 times.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD + 5 damage.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half HD, and your combo resets.

name: Black Arrow
description:
You fire an arrow steeped in shadow magic, which eats away at the target's life force and leaves them vulnerable.

In a timed scene, you use 'Black Arrow'.

Black Arrow

When you fire a shadow-laced arrow, spend 1 MP and roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: The arrow hits. The target takes your SD as magical (shadow) damage over 2 rounds, and is Taunted by your animal companion for the duration.
  • On a 9-15: The target takes your SD as magical (shadow) damage over 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The arrow deals half your SD instantly, but has no lingering effect.

name: Guerrilla Tactics
description:
You are a master of unconventional warfare, making your traps deadlier and more cunning.

Guerrilla Tactics

(Passive)

Whenever an enemy triggers one of your trap features (like Snake Trap, Explosive Trap, or Freezing Trap), the trap's effects are empowered. All damage dealt is increased by +3, and all conditions applied last for 1 additional round.

name: Terms of Engagement
description:
You excel at catching foes off-guard, using your harpoon to drag them exactly where you want them.

Terms of Engagement

(Passive)

Your melee attacks have a permanent +1 to their Reach. When you successfully hit an enemy at your maximum reach with a melee attack, you may immediately Pull 1 them.

name: Cobra Shot
description:
A quick, venomous shot that generates focus and urges your pet to attack.

This is a Focus generator.

Cobra Shot

(Builder) When you attack with a ranged weapon, roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD and generate 30 Focus. Your pet may immediately use its reaction to move up to half its speed toward your target.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD and generate 20 Focus.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your HD and generate 10 Focus.

name: Kill Command
description:
You give a savage command to your animal companion, ordering it to strike with brutal, overwhelming force.

This move requires an active Animal Companion.

Kill Command

When you use your action to command your pet, choose a target within your pet's SPEED and spend 20 Focus. Roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: Your companion immediately attacks, dealing its HD. This attack is a guaranteed critical hit.
  • On a 9-15: Your companion's attack deals its HD + 5.
  • On a 1-8: Your companion's attack deals its normal HD, but the effort is taxing; it cannot use this move again this combat.

name: Bestial Wrath
description:
You and your animal companion enter a shared state of primal fury, becoming engines of destruction.

This move requires an active Animal Companion.

Bestial Wrath

When you spend an action to incite a rage, spend 2 SP and roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: For 2 rounds, you and your companion deal +5 damage with all HD attacks, and are both immune to the Frightened and Charmed conditions.
  • On a 9-15: The effect lasts for only 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The rage is uncontrolled. You and your companion are Confused for 1 round.

name: Stampede
description:
You summon a herd of spectral beasts from the wild to thunder across the battlefield, trampling your foes.

In a timed scene, you use 'Stampede'.

Stampede

Once per day, when you spend an action and 3 MP, choose a direction. A spectral herd stampedes in a 3-square wide line for 8 squares. Roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: Any enemy caught in the stampede takes 2d8 HD and is knocked prone.
  • On a 9-15: Enemies take 2d8 HD but are not knocked prone.
  • On a 1-8: The stampede is chaotic and also affects allies, dealing 1d8 HD to everyone in its path.

name: Frenzy
description:
Your companion's repeated attacks whip it into a frenzy, making it strike faster and faster.

Frenzy

(Passive)

This requires an active Animal Companion. Each time your companion successfully hits with a basic attack, it gains a stack of Frenzy (max 5). Each stack grants it +1 damage. The stacks are lost if it attacks a different target or does not attack for a round.

name: Kindred Spirits
description:
Your bond with your animal companion is so deep that your vitality is intertwined.

Kindred Spirits

(Passive)

This requires an active Animal Companion. Your maximum HP is increased by +5, and your companion's maximum HP is increased by +10.

name: Unstable Affliction
description:
You inflict a volatile curse that damages the target over time and explodes violently if dispelled or when it expires.

In a timed scene, you use 'Unstable Affliction'.

Unstable Affliction

When you curse a target within 7 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The target is cursed for 3 rounds, taking your SD as magical damage at the start of their turn. When the effect ends, it explodes, dealing your MD to the target and all adjacent creatures.
  • On a 9-15: The curse lasts for 2 rounds. The final explosion only affects the primary target.
  • On a 1-8: The curse is weak, lasting only 1 round and dealing half your SD. It does not explode.

name: Seed of Corruption
description:
You embed a demonic seed in a target. When the target takes enough damage, the seed bursts, spreading your curses to all nearby foes.

In a timed scene, you use 'Seed of Corruption'.

Seed of Corruption

When you curse a target within 7 squares, spend 2 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The target is seeded for 3 rounds. The next time the target takes damage equal to or greater than your MD from any source, the seed explodes. Your 'Curse of Agony' is applied to the target and up to three enemies within 3 squares of them.
  • On a 9-15: The seed explodes and applies the curse to the target and one other enemy.
  • On a 1-8: The seed fails to embed properly and immediately withers.

name: Banish
description:
You temporarily banish an Elemental or Demon from the physical plane, rendering them unable to act or be acted upon.

In a timed scene, you use 'Banish'.

Banish

When you attempt to banish a Demon or Elemental within 6 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: The target is banished for 3 rounds. It is completely removed from combat and cannot be targeted or damaged. It reappears in the same spot when the effect ends.
  • On a 9-15: The banishment lasts for only 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The creature resists. It is not banished and gains +3 forward on its next action against you.

name: Howl of Terror
description:
You unleash a terrifying howl from the depths of the abyss, sending multiple enemies fleeing in panic.

In a timed scene, you use 'Howl of Terror'.

Howl of Terror

When you spend an action and 2 MP to unleash a howl, roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: All enemies in a 5-square cone are affected. If an enemy's WIS is less than your CHA, they are Frightened for 2 rounds. Otherwise, they are Frightened for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: The howl affects a single target enemy. They are Frightened for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The howl is unconvincing. The nearest enemy is angered by your shout, becoming Taunted by you.

name: Dark Pact
description:
You make a pact with your demonic minion, sacrificing a portion of its life force to create a powerful shield of shadow on yourself.

This move requires an active summoned Demon.

Dark Pact

When you spend an action to form a pact, your demon takes irreducible damage equal to your MD. Roll+CON.

  • On a 16+: You gain a shield that grants you temporary HP equal to double the damage your demon took. The shield lasts for 3 rounds or until depleted.
  • On a 9-15: You gain temporary HP equal to the damage your demon took.
  • On a 1-8: The pact is flawed. You gain temporary HP, but you are also Weakened for 1 round.

name: Shadowfury
description:
You summon a column of shadow and flame at a target location, stunning all enemies caught in the blast.

In a timed scene, you use 'Shadowfury'.

Shadowfury

When you spend 2 MP to call down a blast at a point within 8 squares, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: A blast erupts in a 3-square radius. All enemies in the area take half your MD and are Stunned for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: The blast only affects a 2-square radius and stuns enemies, but deals no damage.
  • On a 1-8: The blast is off-center, landing 1d4 squares away in a random direction.

name: Enslave Demon
description:
You attempt to shatter the will of a lesser demon, binding it to your service.

In a timed scene, you use 'Enslave Demon' on an enemy Demon.

Enslave Demon

When you spend your action and 3 MP to control a demon within 6 squares, roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: You gain control of the target for 3 rounds. If its WIS is less than your CHA, the control is permanent until it is defeated. On its turns, you dictate its actions.
  • On a 9-15: You gain control for only 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The demon resists your control and is now immune to this ability. It becomes Taunted by you for the rest of combat.

name: Mortal Coil
description:
You lash a target with a bolt of necrotic energy that instills deep horror, siphoning a fragment of their vitality back to you.

In a timed scene, you use 'Mortal Coil'.

Mortal Coil

When you attack a target within 6 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD. The target is Frightened for 1 round, and you heal for an amount equal to the damage dealt.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD, and you heal for half the damage dealt.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your MD, and the psychic feedback leaves you Weakened for 1 round.

name: Summon Voidwalker
description:
You pull a hulking, brutish demon from the Void to serve as your personal bodyguard.

In a timed scene, you use 'Summon Voidwalker'.

Summon Voidwalker

When you spend 2 MP to open a demonic gate, roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: You summon a Voidwalker in an adjacent square. It lasts for 3 rounds, has 25 HP, 1 Armor, and its basic attack deals 1d6 HD. It can use its action to Taunt an enemy.
  • On a 9-15: The Voidwalker lasts for 3 rounds but has only 15 HP.
  • On a 1-8: The summoning fails, and the demonic energy lashes out, making you Weakened for 1 round.

name: Ritual of Souls
description:
You perform a dark ritual to create a 'Soulstone'. This stone can be given to an ally, allowing them to cheat death.

This ritual takes 10 minutes to perform outside of combat.

Ritual of Souls

When you create a Soulstone, spend 3 MP. You create a single-use item. When the creature holding the Soulstone would die (result of 1-8 on Last Breath), they can choose to consume it. If they do, they return to life with 25% of their HP. The stone lasts until used or until your next rest.

name: Soul Leech
description:
Your destructive magic creates a shield of stolen life force around you, protecting you from harm.

Soul Leech

(Passive)

Whenever you deal magical damage with a Warlock spell, you gain a protective shield that grants you temporary HP equal to 25% of the damage dealt. This shield can stack up to a maximum of your character's max HP and lasts until the end of combat.

name: Nightfall
description:
The lingering agony of your curses sometimes grants you a burst of shadowy insight, allowing you to cast your next spell with supernatural speed.

Nightfall

(Passive)

Whenever one of your curse spells (like Curse of Agony) deals damage at the start of an enemy's turn, roll a d6. On a 6, your next Drain Soul or Hellfire becomes instant (a free action).

name: Demonic Embrace
description:
Your dealings with demons have toughened your soul and body, making you unnaturally resilient.

Demonic Embrace

(Passive)

Your maximum HP is permanently increased by an amount equal to your CON modifier + 5.

name: Fel Armor
description:
You surround yourself with an aura of fel energy that hardens your skin and harms those who strike you.

Fel Armor

(Passive)

You have a permanent +1 bonus to your Armor. Additionally, whenever an enemy hits you with a melee attack, they take 1d4 magical (fire) damage.

name: Shadow Mastery
description:
Your command of the shadows is absolute, making your dark magic exceptionally potent.

Shadow Mastery

(Passive)

All magical damage you deal with spells that have the 'shadow' or 'necrotic' keyword is increased by +3.

name: Master Summoner
description:
You have mastered the art of demonic summoning, allowing you to call upon your minions with greater ease and keep them on a tighter leash.

Master Summoner

(Passive)

The MP cost of all your 'Summon' spells is reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 1). Additionally, the duration of all your summoned demons is increased by 1 round.

name: Grimoire of Sacrifice
description:
You have chosen to sacrifice your bond with your demonic minions in exchange for greater personal power.

Grimoire of Sacrifice

(Passive)

You can no longer use any 'Summon' spells. In exchange, your maximum MP is increased by 10, and all your spells that deal magical damage deal +2 additional damage.

name: Eradication
description:
Your curses eat away at your target's magical defenses, leaving them vulnerable to your other spells.

Eradication

(Passive)

Enemies currently affected by your 'Curse of Agony' are considered to have 0 Armor against your magical damage.

name: Soulburn
description:
You have learned to consume a Soul Shard to empower your next spell with incredible effects.

Soulburn

(Passive)

When you cast a spell, you may choose to spend a Soul Shard as a free action. If you do, the spell gains a powerful secondary effect (GM's discretion or based on the spell). Examples: Your next 'Fear' becomes instant and affects an additional target; Your next 'Summon' is instant; Your next 'Curse' also applies a Slowed condition.

name: Everlasting Affliction
description:
Your curses are notoriously difficult to remove and seem to linger with malevolent tenacity.

Everlasting Affliction

(Passive)

The duration of all your curse spells (like Curse of Agony) is increased by 1 round. Additionally, if an enemy attempts to magically Cleanse or remove one of your curses, they have disadvantage on their roll.

name: Mind Flay
description:
You assault the target's mind with shadow energy, dealing damage and hindering their movement.

In a timed scene, you use 'Mind Flay'.

Mind Flay

When you spend your action to channel an assault on an enemy's mind within 7 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal your SD as magical (shadow) damage. The target is also Slowed for 2 rounds. You can continue to channel this as your action each turn, granting the same effect without a new roll for up to 3 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your SD and the target is Slowed for 1 round. You may continue to channel next turn.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your SD, and the psychic feedback leaves you Weakened for 1 round.

name: Shadow Word: Pain
description:
A word of dark power that inflicts lingering, wracking pain upon your foe.

In a timed scene, you use 'Shadow Word: Pain'.

Shadow Word: Pain

When you curse a target within 8 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The target is cursed with pain. At the start of their next 3 turns, they take 1d8 magical (shadow) damage.
  • On a 9-15: The curse lasts for 2 turns, dealing 1d8 damage each turn.
  • On a 1-8: The curse lasts for only 1 turn, dealing 1d6 damage.

name: Psychic Scream
description:
You unleash a psychic shriek from your mind, causing all nearby enemies to flee in terror.
