In a timed scene, you use 'Psychic Scream'.

Psychic Scream

When you spend an action and 2 MP to unleash a mental assault, roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: All enemies within a 3-square radius are affected. If an enemy's WIS is less than your CHA, they are Frightened for 2 rounds. Otherwise, they are Frightened for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: All adjacent enemies are Frightened for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The psychic feedback frightens you instead; you are Frightened for 1 round from the nearest enemy.

name: Mind Blast
description:
You blast the target's mind with a powerful spike of shadow energy, leaving them vulnerable to your psychic attacks.

In a timed scene, you use 'Mind Blast'.

Mind Blast

When you attack a target's mind within 7 squares, spend 2 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD + 5 as magical (shadow) damage. For the next 2 rounds, the target is vulnerable to psychic attacks, taking +3 damage from your Mind Flay and Mind Sear.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD + 5.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your MD, and the mental exertion leaves you unable to use this move again this combat.

name: Shadow Word: Death
description:
A word of finality that attempts to snuff out a foe's life force, but at great risk to yourself if it fails.

In a timed scene, you use 'Shadow Word: Death'.

Shadow Word: Death

When you target an enemy below half HP within 6 squares, spend 1 SP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD + 10 as magical (shadow) damage.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD + 5. If this does not defeat the target, you take half of the damage you dealt.
  • On a 1-8: You deal your MD. If this does not defeat the target, you take the full amount of damage you dealt.

name: Devouring Plague
description:
You afflict your target with a voracious shadowy disease that consumes their life force and transfers it to you.

In a timed scene, you use 'Devouring Plague'.

Devouring Plague

When you curse a target within 7 squares, spend 2 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The target is cursed for 3 rounds. At the start of their turn, they take 1d6 magical (shadow) damage, and you heal for the amount of damage dealt.
  • On a 9-15: The curse lasts for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The curse lasts for only 1 round and you do not heal.

name: Void Eruption
description:
You unleash a torrent of shadow energy, causing all your lingering curses in an area to violently explode.

In a timed scene, you use 'Void Eruption'.

Void Eruption

When you spend your action and 3 MP to erupt with void energy, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: Choose up to three enemies within 8 squares who are affected by your Shadow Word: Pain or Devouring Plague. Those effects are consumed, and each target immediately takes 2d10 magical (shadow) damage.
  • On a 9-15: You may choose up to two enemies. They take 2d8 magical damage.
  • On a 1-8: You may choose one enemy. They take 1d10 damage, and you are Stunned for 1 round from the backlash.

name: Fade
description:
You briefly fade from sight and mind, causing enemies to lose track of you and turn their attention elsewhere.

In a timed scene, you use 'Fade'.

Fade

(Reaction) When you are targeted by an attack, you can spend your reaction and 1 SP to fade. Roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: You become Invisible until the end of your next turn, and the attack misses. All enemies currently Taunted by you are no longer taunted.
  • On a 9-15: You become Invisible for 1 round, and the attack misses.
  • On a 1-8: You only become translucent. The attack against you has disadvantage.

name: Prayer of Mending
description:
You cast a prayer that mends an ally's wounds, then leaps to another injured ally like a chain of light.

In a timed scene, you use 'Prayer of Mending'.

Prayer of Mending

When you heal an ally within 8 squares, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The target heals 1d8+5 HP. The prayer then leaps to the most injured ally (including yourself) within 5 squares, healing them for the same amount.
  • On a 9-15: The primary target heals 1d8+5 HP, and the prayer leaps to a second target, healing them for 1d8.
  • On a 1-8: The primary target heals 1d8+5 HP, but the prayer does not leap.

name: Surrender to Madness
description:
You give in completely to the whispers of the Void, gaining immense power at a terrible, inevitable price.

In a timed scene, you use 'Surrender to Madness'.

Surrender to Madness

Once per day, as an action, you can choose to surrender. For the next 3 rounds, all your spells are instant (free actions) and generate double the resources. After the third round, you are reduced to 0 HP and must immediately make a Last Breath roll with disadvantage.

name: Shadowform
description:
Your connection to the Void becomes permanent, shrouding you in a persistent aura of shadow that empowers your dark magic.

Shadowform

(Passive)

You may enter or leave this form as a free action on your turn. While in Shadowform, all your magical (shadow) damage is increased by +2, and you gain +1 Armor. However, you cannot cast Holy spells while in this form.

name: Spirit Tap
description:
When a foe dies in your presence, you instinctively draw a portion of their escaping spirit to replenish your own power.

Spirit Tap

(Passive)

Whenever an enemy dies within 5 squares of you, you regain 1d4 MP.

name: Twist of Fate
description:
Hurting a weakened foe fills you with a surge of dark power, accelerating your assault.

Twist of Fate

(Passive)

After you deal damage to an enemy who is below half HP, you gain a Twist of Fate for 2 rounds. While this is active, all your damage and healing is increased by +3. This effect cannot refresh while active.

name: Shadowy Apparitions
description:
The pain you inflict manifests as shadowy ghosts that fly toward your cursed targets.

Shadowy Apparitions

(Passive)

When your Shadow Word: Pain or Devouring Plague deals damage, roll a d6. On a 5 or 6, you conjure a shadowy apparition that immediately flies to the target, dealing 1d6 magical (shadow) damage.

name: Body and Soul
description:
Your protective spells are infused with an ethereal quality, quickening your ally's steps.

Body and Soul

(Passive)

Whenever you cast Power Word Shield on an ally, their SPEED is also increased by 3 for 2 rounds.

name: Masochism
description:
Pain is a conduit for power. When you are harmed, you draw upon the agony to fuel your magic.

Masochism

(Passive)

Whenever you take damage from an attack, you regain 1 MP. This effect can only occur once per round.

name: Void Touched
description:
Your constant exposure to the Void has made you resilient to its maddening whispers and corrupting influence.

Void Touched

(Passive)

You have advantage on all rolls to resist the Confused and Frightened conditions. You take half damage from all sources of magical (shadow) damage.

name: Pain and Suffering
description:
The raw power of your Mind Blast intensifies the agony of your lingering curses.

Pain and Suffering

(Passive)

When you successfully deal damage to a target with Mind Blast, the duration of your Shadow Word: Pain on that target is refreshed to its full duration.

name: Auspicious Spirits
description:
Your Shadowy Apparitions do more than just cause pain; they also siphon spiritual energy for your dark ends.

Auspicious Spirits

(Passive)

Whenever one of your Shadowy Apparitions deals damage, you regain 1 SP.

name: Mental Fortitude
description:
Your mastery of the mind has fortified your own, making you a bulwark against mental intrusion.

Mental Fortitude

(Passive)

Your maximum SP is increased by 10. You have a permanent +1 bonus on all WIS rolls.

name: Arcane Explosion
description:
You create a burst of raw arcane energy, damaging all enemies around you.

In a timed scene, you use 'Arcane Explosion'.

Arcane Explosion

When you spend an action and 1 MP to create a burst of energy, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD to all enemies in a 2-square radius around you and gain 1 Arcane Charge for each enemy hit (max 4).
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD to all adjacent enemies and gain 1 Arcane Charge.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your MD to all adjacent enemies, but the backlash leaves you Weakened.

name: Counterspell
description:
You instantly counter an enemy's spell, preventing it from being cast and locking them out of that school of magic.

In a timed scene, you use 'Counterspell'.

Counterspell

(Reaction) When an enemy you can see within 8 squares begins to cast a spell, you can spend your reaction and 1 MP to counter it. Roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The spell is interrupted and fails. The caster is also Deafened and unable to cast spells for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: The spell is interrupted and fails.
  • On a 1-8: You interrupt the spell, but the chaotic energy makes you Weakened for 1 round.

name: Presence of Mind
description:
You enter a state of perfect mental clarity, allowing you to cast your next spell in the blink of an eye.

In a timed scene, you use 'Presence of Mind'.

Presence of Mind

Once per combat, you can use your action to focus your mind. Your next spell that requires an action to cast becomes a free action instead.

name: Slow
description:
You bend time around a target, drastically reducing their movement and attack speed.

In a timed scene, you use 'Slow'.

Slow

When you spend an action and 2 MP to alter time around a target within 8 squares, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The target is Slowed for 3 rounds. Additionally, they can only make one attack on each of their turns.
  • On a 9-15: The target is Slowed for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The time magic is unstable. The target is Slowed for 1 round, but so are you.

name: Arcane Potency
description:
Your command of arcane energies is masterful, allowing you to imbue all your spells with greater power.

Arcane Potency

(Passive)

All magical damage you deal with Arcane, Fire, and Frost spells is increased by +2.

name: Mana Adept
description:
Your body is a natural conduit for mana, allowing you to store a much larger reserve of magical energy.

Mana Adept

(Passive)

Your maximum MP is permanently increased by 10.

name: Frostbolt
description:
You launch a bolt of jagged ice that chills your target to the bone, hindering their movement.

In a timed scene, you use 'Frostbolt'.

Frostbolt

(Builder) When you attack an enemy within 8 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD as magical (cold) damage and gain 2 Arcane Charges. The target is Slowed for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD, gain 1 Arcane Charge, and the target is Slowed for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your MD and gain 1 Arcane Charge.

name: Ice Lance
description:
A quick shard of ice that is relatively weak, but devastating against a frozen target.

In a timed scene, you use 'Ice Lance'.

Ice Lance

When you attack an enemy within 8 squares, spend 0 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal 1d6 magical (cold) damage. If the target is currently Immobilized or Stunned by one of your cold effects, this attack deals your MD + 10 instead.
  • On a 9-15: You deal 1d4 damage. If the target is frozen, it deals your MD instead.
  • On a 1-8: The lance shatters harmlessly.

name: Deep Freeze
description:
You encase an already chilled foe in a block of solid ice, stunning them completely.

This can only be used on a target currently affected by one of your Slowed effects.

Deep Freeze

When you spend an action and 2 MP to freeze a slowed target, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The target is Stunned for 2 rounds. This effect does not break on damage.
  • On a 9-15: The target is Stunned for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The ice is brittle. The target is Stunned, but the effect breaks after they take any damage.

name: Ice Block
description:
You instantly entomb yourself in a block of ice, becoming immune to all harm but unable to act.

In a timed scene, you use 'Ice Block'.

Ice Block

(Reaction) Once per day, when you would take damage, you can spend your reaction to use Ice Block. You become immune to all damage and hostile effects for 2 rounds. You cannot move, act, or take reactions while in the Ice Block. You can end the effect early as a free action on your turn.

name: Shatter
description:
Your spells are exceptionally potent against frozen targets, striking them as if they were made of glass.

Shatter

(Passive)

All of your spells have a doubled critical hit chance against enemies that are Immobilized or Stunned by one of your cold effects. For example, a natural roll of 19 or 20 would be a critical hit.

name: Fingers of Frost
description:
Your chilling Frostbolts can leave an enemy so cold they are treated as frozen, setting them up for a devastating follow-up.

Fingers of Frost

(Passive)

When you successfully cast Frostbolt, roll a d6. On a 5 or 6, you gain Fingers of Frost. Your next Ice Lance attack treats the target as if it were frozen, regardless of its actual state.

name: Winter's Chill
description:
Your presence is a biting cold that saps the energy from your enemies.

Winter's Chill

(Passive)

All enemies that start their turn adjacent to you are automatically Slowed for 1 round.

name: Fireball
description:
You hurl a ball of fire that explodes on impact, leaving the target smoldering.

In a timed scene, you use 'Fireball'.

Fireball

(Builder) When you attack an enemy within 8 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD + 3 as magical (fire) damage and gain 2 Arcane Charges. The target is Burning for 1d4 damage for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD, gain 1 Arcane Charge, and the target is Burning for 1d4 for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your MD and gain 1 Arcane Charge.

name: Pyroblast
description:
You conjure a massive boulder of fire, a slow but devastating spell that can be cast instantly with enough preparation.

This is a finisher that spends Arcane Charges.

Pyroblast

(Finisher) When you have at least 1 Arcane Charge, spend your action and all charges.

You deal your character's MD. For each Arcane Charge spent, you deal an additional 1d10 magical (fire) damage. If you spent 4 charges, this attack is a guaranteed critical hit.

name: Dragon's Breath
description:
You breathe a cone of fire that scorches and disorients your foes.

In a timed scene, you use 'Dragon's Breath'.

Dragon's Breath

When you spend 2 MP to breathe fire, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD as fire damage to all targets in a 4-square cone. If a target's CON is less than your INT, they are also Confused for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: You deal half your MD to all targets in the cone, and they are Weakened for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The fire sputters, dealing 1d6 damage to all creatures in the cone, including allies.

name: Combustion
description:
You cause your target to erupt in an inferno, spreading your burning effects to all nearby enemies.

In a timed scene, you use 'Combustion'.

Combustion

When you target an enemy currently afflicted by one of your Burning effects, spend your action and 2 MP. Roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The target explodes with fire. Your Burning effect is immediately applied to all other enemies within a 3-square radius of the target.
  • On a 9-15: The effect spreads to only one other enemy within 3 squares.
  • On a 1-8: The combustion is contained, dealing 1d8 fire damage to the primary target but not spreading.

name: Hot Streak
description:
Successive critical strikes heat your mind and body, allowing you to cast your most powerful spell in an instant.

Hot Streak

(Passive)

When you get two critical hits in a row with your fire spells (natural 20 on the d20 roll), you enter a Hot Streak. Your next Pyroblast becomes instant (a free action) and costs 0 Arcane Charges, though it does not benefit from spending them.

name: Ignite
description:
Your critical fire spells leave a lingering, searing heat that continues to burn your foes.

Ignite

(Passive)

When you score a critical hit with a fire spell, the target is automatically Burning for an amount of damage equal to your INT modifier (minimum 1) for 2 rounds. This can stack with other Burning effects.

name: Firestarter
description:
Your fire spells are so intense they can set the very terrain ablaze.

Firestarter

(Passive)

When you successfully deal fire damage to an enemy with a spell, you can choose to set their square on fire. It becomes Ablaze for 1 round, dealing 1d4 fire damage to any creature that starts its turn there.

name: Healing Wave
description:
A slow but powerful wave of healing water that restores a significant amount of health.

In a timed scene, you use 'Healing Wave'.

Healing Wave

When you spend an action to heal an ally within 8 squares, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The target heals for your MD + 10.
  • On a 9-15: The target heals for your MD + 5.
  • On a 1-8: The wave is weak and only heals for your MD.

name: Chain Heal
description:
You send a wave of healing energy that leaps from one injured ally to the next.

In a timed scene, you use 'Chain Heal'.

Chain Heal

When you spend an action to heal an ally within 8 squares, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: Your primary target heals for your MD. The heal then leaps to up to two other injured allies within 4 squares, healing each for a slightly reduced amount.
  • On a 9-15: The heal leaps to only one additional ally.
  • On a 1-8: The heal only affects your primary target.

name: Riptide
description:
You blast an ally with a quick burst of healing water that continues to mend their wounds over time.

In a timed scene, you use 'Riptide'.

Riptide

When you heal an ally within 8 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The target heals 1d8 HP instantly, and then regains 1d8 HP at the start of their next 2 turns.
  • On a 9-15: The target heals 1d6 instantly and regains 1d6 for their next 2 turns.
  • On a 1-8: The target only receives the healing-over-time effect.

name: Healing Rain
description:
You summon a shower of healing rain over an area, mending the wounds of all allies within it.

In a timed scene, you use 'Healing Rain'.

Healing Rain

When you spend your action and 2 MP, choose a 3x3 square area within 8 squares. Roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The rain lasts for 3 rounds. Any ally who starts their turn in the area heals 1d8 HP.
  • On a 9-15: The rain lasts for 2 rounds and heals 1d8 HP.
  • On a 1-8: The rain lasts for 2 rounds, but only heals 1d4 HP.

name: Earthen Wall Totem
description:
You summon a totem of earth that projects a protective barrier, absorbing damage meant for your allies.

In a timed scene, you use 'Earthen Wall Totem'.

Earthen Wall Totem

When you place a totem in an adjacent empty square, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS. The totem has 25 HP and lasts for 3 rounds. Whenever an ally within 3 squares would take damage, the totem takes the damage instead until its HP is depleted.

name: Spirit Link Totem
description:
You place a totem that creates a spiritual bond between your allies, evenly distributing their vitality and pain.

In a timed scene, you use 'Spirit Link Totem'.

Spirit Link Totem

When you place a totem in an adjacent empty square, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The totem lasts for 3 rounds. At the end of your turn, the HP of all allies within a 3-square radius is redistributed evenly among them.
  • On a 9-15: The totem lasts for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The totem links friend and foe alike, redistributing the HP of all creatures in the radius.

name: Unleash Life
description:
You unleash a wave of pure life energy, providing a small heal and significantly empowering your next healing spell.

In a timed scene, you use 'Unleash Life'.

Unleash Life

When you heal an ally within 8 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The target heals 1d6 HP. Your next healing spell cast this turn heals for 50% more.
  • On a 9-15: Your next healing spell cast this turn heals for 25% more.
  • On a 1-8: The target heals 1d6, but the empowerment fails.

name: Purify Spirit
description:
You cleanse an ally's spirit, removing a harmful curse or poison from them.

In a timed scene, you use 'Purify Spirit'.

Purify Spirit

When you attempt to remove an ailment from a target within 8 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You successfully remove one Poisoned condition and one magical curse.
  • On a 9-15: You remove one Poisoned condition or one curse of your choice.
  • On a 1-8: You only suppress the ailment for 1 round instead of removing it.

name: Wellspring
description:
You create a wave of healing waters that flows forward from you, healing all allies in its path.

In a timed scene, you use 'Wellspring'.

Wellspring

When you spend an action and 2 MP to unleash a wave, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You unleash a wave that affects a 5-square cone. All allies in the cone heal for your MD.
  • On a 9-15: The cone is only 3 squares long.
  • On a 1-8: The wave is weak and only heals adjacent allies for half your MD.

name: Ancestral Protection Totem
description:
You summon a totem that grants allies a protective ward from the ancestors, increasing their health.

In a timed scene, you use 'Ancestral Protection Totem'.

Ancestral Protection Totem

When you place a totem in an adjacent empty square, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The totem lasts for 3 rounds. While it is active, all allies within a 3-square radius have their maximum HP increased by 10.
  • On a 9-15: The totem lasts for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The totem only affects you.

name: Tidal Waves
description:
Casting your Chain Heal or Riptide makes your subsequent Healing Wave faster and more likely to be critical.

Tidal Waves

(Passive)

When you cast Chain Heal or Riptide, you gain a stack of Tidal Waves (max 2). Each stack increases the critical strike chance of your next Healing Wave by 10% and reduces its MP cost by 1. Consumes all stacks.

name: Resurgence
description:
Your direct heals have a chance to leave a minor regenerative effect on your target.

Resurgence

(Passive)

When you successfully heal a target with Healing Wave or Chain Heal, roll a d6. On a 5 or 6, the target also receives a minor Rejuvenation, healing them for 1d4 HP at the start of their next 2 turns.

name: Earth Shield
description:
You can surround an ally with a shield of living earth that heals them whenever they are struck.

Earth Shield

(Passive)

As a free action on your turn, you can place an Earth Shield on one ally within 8 squares. The shield has 5 charges. Each time that ally takes damage, a charge is consumed and they heal for 1d6 HP. The shield lasts until all charges are consumed. You can only have one Earth Shield active at a time.

name: Ancestral Guidance
description:
Once per day, when you would roll a Low Hit (1-8), you may ask the spirits for guidance and treat the result as a Medium Hit (9-15) instead.

Ancestral Guidance

(Passive)

Once per day, when you would roll a Low Hit (1-8) on any roll, you may ask the spirits for guidance and treat the result as a Medium Hit (9-15) instead.

name: Deluge
description:
Your Chain Heal is more effective on targets standing within your Healing Rain.

Deluge

(Passive)

Allies who are standing inside your Healing Rain receive 20% more healing from your Chain Heal.

name: Undulation
description:
Your healing waves ebb and flow, creating a rhythm where every third wave is significantly more powerful.

Undulation

(Passive)

Every third Healing Wave you cast on any target heals for an additional 50%.

name: Graceful Spirit
description:
Your Spiritwalker's Grace also grants you a protective spiritual aura, making you harder to harm.

Graceful Spirit

(Passive)

While your Spiritwalker's Grace feature is active, you gain +2 Armor.

name: Crashing Waves
description:
The undertow of your Riptide empowers your chained heals.

Crashing Waves

(Passive)

When you heal a target that is currently affected by your Riptide with Chain Heal, the initial heal is increased by +5, and it can leap one additional time.

name: Tidal Chains
description:
Your Chain Heal flows more efficiently between allies who are close together.

Tidal Chains

(Passive)

The healing reduction of your Chain Heal as it jumps between targets is halved if the next target is adjacent to the previous one.

name: Living Stream
description:
Your Healing Stream Totem is infused with potent life energy, granting it an extra healing pulse when summoned.

Living Stream

(Passive)

When you summon your Healing Stream Totem, it immediately releases a pulse, healing all allies within its radius for 1d8 HP. This is in addition to its normal effects.

name: Lightning Bolt
description:
You call upon the fury of the storm, hurling a bolt of lightning that generates elemental power.

This is a Maelstrom Power generator.

Lightning Bolt

(Builder) When you attack a target within 8 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD + 3 as magical (lightning) damage and generate 2 Maelstrom Power.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD and generate 1 Maelstrom Power.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your MD and generate 1 Maelstrom Power.

name: Earth Shock
description:
You unleash your stored elemental power in a concussive blast of earthen energy.

This is a finisher that spends Maelstrom Power.

Earth Shock

(Finisher) When you have at least 1 Maelstrom Power, you can use your action and spend all charges.

You deal your MD to your primary target. For each Maelstrom Power spent, you deal an additional 1d8 magical damage. This move does not require a roll.

name: Frost Shock
description:
You chill a target with a blast of freezing air, hindering their movement.

In a timed scene, you use 'Frost Shock'.

Frost Shock

When you attack a target within 6 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal half your MD as cold damage. The target is Immobilized for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: You deal 1d6 cold damage and the target is Slowed for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The target is Slowed for 1 round, but you deal no damage.

name: Lightning Rod Totem
description:
You summon a totem that attracts your electrical spells, storing the energy and then releasing it in a powerful burst.

In a timed scene, you use 'Lightning Rod Totem'.

Lightning Rod Totem

When you place a totem in an adjacent empty square, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS. The totem has 10 HP and lasts for 3 rounds. Each time you deal lightning damage to an enemy, the totem gains a charge. It can use its action to do the following:

Discharge: Spend all charges. Deal 1d6 lightning damage per charge to one enemy within 6 squares.

name: Elemental Blast
description:
You focus the raw power of the elements into a single, chaotic blast that empowers you.

In a timed scene, you use 'Elemental Blast'.

Elemental Blast

When you attack a target within 8 squares, spend 2 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD + 5 as magical damage. You gain +2 to your STR, DEX, or INT (your choice) for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD + 5.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your MD, but the chaotic energy leaves you Weakened.

name: Skyfury Totem
description:
You place a totem that channels the power of the raging sky, empowering the critical strikes of your allies.

In a timed scene, you use 'Skyfury Totem'.

Skyfury Totem

When you place a totem in an adjacent empty square, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The totem creates a 4-square radius aura for 3 rounds. All allies within the aura gain +5 damage on their critical hits.
  • On a 9-15: The totem's aura lasts for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The totem is unstable and immediately explodes, dealing 1d4 magical damage to everyone in adjacent squares.

name: Capacitor Totem
description:
You place a totem that gathers static energy before releasing it in a stunning electrical pulse.

In a timed scene, you use 'Capacitor Totem'.

Capacitor Totem

When you place a totem in an adjacent empty square, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS. At the start of your next turn, the totem explodes. Roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: All enemies within a 3-square radius are Stunned for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: All enemies within a 2-square radius are Stunned for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The pulse is weak and only affects adjacent enemies.

name: Primal Elementalist
description:
You summon a powerful Earth or Fire elemental to serve you in battle.

In a timed scene, you use 'Summon Elemental'.

Summon Elemental

Once per day, spend 3 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You summon a Greater Elemental (Fire or Earth) for 3 rounds. It has 30 HP, 1 Armor, and its attacks deal 1d8 HD. You can command it as a free action.
  • On a 9-15: You summon a regular Elemental for 3 rounds with 20 HP.
  • On a 1-8: The elemental is unruly and will attack the nearest creature (friend or foe) each turn.

name: Static Charge
description:
You overload an ally or enemy with static energy that discharges on their next melee attack.

In a timed scene, you use 'Static Charge'.

Static Charge

When you spend an action and 1 MP to charge a creature within 6 squares, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The next time the target hits or is hit by a melee attack, a blast of lightning erupts. The attacker takes your MD and is Pushed 1. The charge then dissipates.
  • On a 9-15: The discharge deals half your MD.
  • On a 1-8: The charge is unstable and immediately discharges, dealing 1d6 damage to the target.

name: Glacial Spike
description:
You conjure a massive shard of ice and hurl it at a foe, dealing massive damage and freezing them in place.

This finisher spends Maelstrom Power for a bonus effect.

Glacial Spike

When you spend your action to attack an enemy within 8 squares, spend 3 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal 2d12 magical (cold) damage. If you spend 2 or more Maelstrom Power, the target is also Immobilized for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: You deal 2d10 magical (cold) damage.
  • On a 1-8: You deal 1d12 magical (cold) damage.

name: Master of the Elements
description:
Casting your powerful elemental spells makes your next nature spell faster.

Master of the Elements

(Passive)

When you successfully cast a spell that deals Fire, Frost, or Nature damage, you gain a buff for 2 rounds. Your next healing or utility spell becomes instant (a free action). This effect can only occur once per round.

name: Elemental Overload
description:
Your elemental spells have a chance to trigger a second, weaker casting on the same target for no cost.

Elemental Overload

(Passive)

When you cast a Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, or Lava Burst spell, roll a d6. On a 5 or 6, an elemental overload occurs, causing a second, identical spell to be cast on the same target for half its normal damage. This second spell does not generate resources.

name: Echo of the Elements
description:
Your damaging spells and totems have a chance to be cast a second time for free.

Echo of the Elements

(Passive)

When you cast a spell that deals damage or summon a Totem, roll a d6. On a 6, the spell or totem is immediately cast again for free on the same target or location.

name: Astral Shift
description:
You instinctively shift partially into the Astral Plane to reduce the impact of powerful blows.

Astral Shift

(Passive)

Once per round, when you take damage from a single source that is greater than 25% of your maximum HP, the damage is halved.

name: Convection
description:
Successfully interrupting an enemy spellcaster with Wind Shear refunds a portion of the mana spent on your next spell.

Convection

(Passive)

When you successfully interrupt an enemy spell with your Wind Shear feature, the MP cost of your next spell is reduced by 2.

name: Shamanism
description:
Your mastery of lightning allows you to cast your basic bolt with greater power and efficiency.

Shamanism

(Passive)

The damage of your Lightning Bolt spell is increased by +3.

name: Surge of Power
description:
Your critical strikes with elemental spells grant you a surge of raw power, making your next finisher even more devastating.

Surge of Power

(Passive)

When you score a critical hit with a spell that deals magical damage, your next Earth Shock or Elemental Blast deals an additional 1d10 damage.

name: Call of Thunder
description:
Your connection to the skies is so strong that your very presence can empower your thunderous abilities.

Call of Thunder

(Passive)

The radius of your Thunderstorm and Earthquake abilities is increased by 1 square.

name: Eye of the Storm
description:
You find a strange calm in the heart of your own magical maelstrom, allowing you to cast spells uninterrupted while taking damage.

Eye of the Storm

(Passive)

You have advantage on all CON rolls made to concentrate or continue channeling a spell while taking damage.

name: Elemental Focus
description:
Repeatedly casting spells of the same element focuses your mind, increasing their power.

Elemental Focus

(Passive)

When you cast a spell of a certain element (Fire, Frost, or Nature), you gain a stack of Elemental Focus. Each stack increases the damage of the next spell you cast of the same element by +2 (max 3 stacks). Casting a spell of a different element resets all stacks.

name: Rockbiter
description:
You strike with the force of stone, a fundamental attack that builds your elemental fury.

This is a Maelstrom generator.

Rockbiter

(Builder) When you attack an enemy in melee, roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD + 3 and generate 25 Maelstrom.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD and generate 20 Maelstrom.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your HD and generate 15 Maelstrom.

name: Stormstrike
description:
You strike your target with both of your weapons, charged with the fury of a thunderstorm.

This move uses Maelstrom.

Stormstrike

When you attack an enemy in melee, spend 30 Maelstrom and roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD, plus an additional 1d10 magical (lightning) damage. This attack has a high chance to trigger Windfury Weapon.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD, plus an additional 1d8 magical (lightning) damage.
  • On a 1-8: You deal your HD, but the feedback leaves you Weakened.

name: Lava Lash
description:
You lash out with your off-hand weapon, superheating it with the power of molten lava.

This move uses Maelstrom.

Lava Lash

When you attack an enemy in melee, spend 20 Maelstrom and roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD as fire damage. If your Flametongue Weapon is active, this damage is doubled.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD as fire damage.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your HD as fire damage.

name: Feral Spirit
description:
You summon two spectral Spirit Wolves to fight at your side, harrying your foes.

In a timed scene, you use 'Feral Spirit'.

Feral Spirit

When you spend an action and 2 SP to summon spirits, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You summon two Spirit Wolves in adjacent squares. They last for 3 rounds, have 15 HP, and their basic attacks deal 1d6 HD and generate 5 Maelstrom for you on a hit.
  • On a 9-15: You summon two Spirit Wolves, but they only last for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: You only manage to summon one Spirit Wolf for 2 rounds.

name: Crash Lightning
description:
You strike a target, causing an explosion of lightning that damages all other foes in front of you.

In a timed scene, you use 'Crash Lightning'.

Crash Lightning

When you attack an enemy in melee, spend 10 Maelstrom and roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD to the primary target. All other enemies in a 3-square cone in front of you take half your HD as lightning damage.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD to the primary target, and other enemies in the cone take 1d6 damage.
  • On a 1-8: You only deal your HD to the primary target.

name: Sundering
description:
You slam the ground with your weapon, creating a fiery fissure that travels towards your enemies.

In a timed scene, you use 'Sundering'.

Sundering

When you spend an action and 20 Maelstrom, roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: A fissure erupts in a 5-square line in front of you. All enemies in the line take your HD and are Stunned for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: The fissure is only 3 squares long, but enemies still take your HD and are stunned.
  • On a 1-8: The fissure is only 3 squares long and only deals half your HD.

name: Doom Winds
description:
You unleash a vortex of wind around yourself, dramatically increasing the speed and frequency of your attacks.

In a timed scene, you use 'Doom Winds'.

Doom Winds

When you spend an action and 2 SP to unleash the winds, roll+CON.

  • On a 16+: For 2 rounds, the chance for your Windfury Weapon to trigger is doubled, and each Windfury strike generates an additional 5 Maelstrom.
  • On a 9-15: The effect lasts for only 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The winds are chaotic. You gain the effect for 1 round, but are Weakened for the duration.

name: Lightning Shield
description:
You surround yourself with a shield of crackling lightning that damages attackers.

In a timed scene, you use 'Lightning Shield'.

Lightning Shield

When you spend an action and 1 MP to create a shield, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: For the next 3 rounds, you have a Lightning Shield with 5 charges. The first enemy to hit you with a melee attack each round takes 1d6 lightning damage and consumes a charge.
  • On a 9-15: The shield only has 3 charges.
  • On a 1-8: The shield has 3 charges, but it's unstable and you take 1d4 lightning damage when you cast it.

name: Spirit Walk
description:
You command the spirits to remove all impediments to your movement, allowing you to reposition freely.

In a timed scene, you use 'Spirit Walk'.

Spirit Walk

When you spend an action to call upon the spirits, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: For 2 rounds, you are immune to all Immobilized and Slowed effects, and your SPEED is increased by 3.
  • On a 9-15: You immediately remove any movement impairing effects, but gain no other benefit.
  • On a 1-8: The spirits are fickle. You remove the effects, but are Weakened for 1 round.

name: Crushing Blow
description:
You deliver a massive overhead strike that can stun even the toughest opponents.

This move uses Maelstrom.

Crushing Blow

When you attack an enemy in melee, spend 40 Maelstrom and roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD. If the target's CON is less than your STR, they are Stunned for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half HD, and you overextend, becoming Weakened for 1 round.

name: Windfury Weapon
description:
You imbue your main-hand weapon with the power of the wind, giving your attacks a chance to strike multiple times.

Windfury Weapon

(Passive)

When you successfully deal HD with a melee weapon, roll a d6. On a 5 or 6, your weapon strikes two additional times, each for half your HD. These extra strikes can also generate Maelstrom.

name: Flametongue Weapon
description:
You imbue your off-hand weapon with the power of fire, causing it to deal additional fire damage with every strike.

Flametongue Weapon

(Passive)

All successful melee attacks with your off-hand weapon deal an additional 1d6 magical (fire) damage.

name: Maelstrom Weapon
description:
Your melee attacks gather the fury of the elements, empowering your spells.

Maelstrom Weapon

(Passive)

When you successfully deal HD with a melee weapon, you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon (max 5). You can spend 5 stacks to make your next magical attack or healing spell instant and deal/heal for an additional +5.

name: Primal Ferocity
description:
Your connection to your primal spirit guides your strikes, making them more likely to hit vital areas.

Primal Ferocity

(Passive)

Your chance to score a critical hit with all physical attacks is permanently increased. For example, a natural roll of 19 or 20 would be a critical hit.

name: Static Shock
description:
Your Lightning Shield has a chance to discharge when you attack, not just when you are attacked.

Static Shock

(Passive)

While your Lightning Shield is active, your successful melee attacks have a chance to consume a charge and deal 1d6 lightning damage to your target. Roll a d6 on a hit; on a 4, 5, or 6, this effect triggers.

name: Unleashed Doom
description:
The winds you command are particularly vicious, ripping and tearing at your foes.

Unleashed Doom

(Passive)

The damage dealt by your Windfury Weapon strikes is increased by +3 per hit.

name: Stormflurry
description:
Your Stormstrike ability has a chance to overload, striking again with pure natural force.

Stormflurry

(Passive)

When you successfully use your Stormstrike feature, roll a d6. On a 5 or 6, you immediately get to use Stormstrike again on the same target for free, though this second strike cannot trigger Stormflurry again.

name: Hailstorm
description:
Your weapon strikes are so cold they leave a biting frost on your enemies.

Hailstorm

(Passive)

When you successfully deal HD with a melee weapon, your target is also afflicted with Hailstorm. They take 1d4 magical (cold) damage at the start of their next turn.

name: Forceful Winds
description:
Your Windfury strikes are so powerful they can knock your opponent off-balance.

Forceful Winds

(Passive)

When your Windfury Weapon triggers, the target is also Pushed 1 away from you.

name: Spirit of the Wolf
description:
Your bond with your Feral Spirits is so strong that their presence quickens your own movements.

Spirit of the Wolf

(Passive)

While you have at least one Spirit Wolf active from your Feral Spirit feature, your base SPEED is increased by 3.

name: Healing Wave
description:
A slow but powerful wave of healing water that restores a significant amount of health.

In a timed scene, you use 'Healing Wave'.

Healing Wave

When you spend an action to heal an ally within 8 squares, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The target heals for your MD + 10.
  • On a 9-15: The target heals for your MD + 5.
  • On a 1-8: The wave is weak and only heals for your MD.

name: Chain Heal
description:
You send a wave of healing energy that leaps from one injured ally to the next.

In a timed scene, you use 'Chain Heal'.

Chain Heal

When you spend an action to heal an ally within 8 squares, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: Your primary target heals for your MD. The heal then leaps to up to two other injured allies within 4 squares, healing each for a slightly reduced amount.
  • On a 9-15: The heal leaps to only one additional ally.
  • On a 1-8: The heal only affects your primary target.

name: Riptide
description:
You blast an ally with a quick burst of healing water that continues to mend their wounds over time.

In a timed scene, you use 'Riptide'.

Riptide

When you heal an ally within 8 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The target heals 1d8 HP instantly, and then regains 1d8 HP at the start of their next 2 turns.
  • On a 9-15: The target heals 1d6 instantly and regains 1d6 for their next 2 turns.
  • On a 1-8: The target only receives the healing-over-time effect.

name: Healing Rain
description:
You summon a shower of healing rain over an area, mending the wounds of all allies within it.

In a timed scene, you use 'Healing Rain'.

Healing Rain

When you spend your action and 2 MP, choose a 3x3 square area within 8 squares. Roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The rain lasts for 3 rounds. Any ally who starts their turn in the area heals 1d8 HP.
  • On a 9-15: The rain lasts for 2 rounds and heals 1d8 HP.
  • On a 1-8: The rain lasts for 2 rounds, but only heals 1d4 HP.

name: Earthen Wall Totem
description:
You summon a totem of earth that projects a protective barrier, absorbing damage meant for your allies.

In a timed scene, you use 'Earthen Wall Totem'.

Earthen Wall Totem

When you place a totem in an adjacent empty square, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS. The totem has 25 HP and lasts for 3 rounds. Whenever an ally within 3 squares would take damage, the totem takes the damage instead until its HP is depleted.

name: Spirit Link Totem
description:
You place a totem that creates a spiritual bond between your allies, evenly distributing their vitality and pain.

In a timed scene, you use 'Spirit Link Totem'.

Spirit Link Totem

When you place a totem in an adjacent empty square, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The totem lasts for 3 rounds. At the end of your turn, the HP of all allies within a 3-square radius is redistributed evenly among them.
  • On a 9-15: The totem lasts for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The totem links friend and foe alike, redistributing the HP of all creatures in the radius.

name: Unleash Life
description:
You unleash a wave of pure life energy, providing a small heal and significantly empowering your next healing spell.

In a timed scene, you use 'Unleash Life'.

Unleash Life

When you heal an ally within 8 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The target heals 1d6 HP. Your next healing spell cast this turn heals for 50% more.
  • On a 9-15: Your next healing spell cast this turn heals for 25% more.
  • On a 1-8: The target heals 1d6, but the empowerment fails.

name: Purify Spirit
description:
You cleanse an ally's spirit, removing a harmful curse or poison from them.

In a timed scene, you use 'Purify Spirit'.

Purify Spirit

When you attempt to remove an ailment from a target within 8 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You successfully remove one Poisoned condition and one magical curse.
  • On a 9-15: You remove one Poisoned condition or one curse of your choice.
  • On a 1-8: You only suppress the ailment for 1 round instead of removing it.

name: Wellspring
description:
You create a wave of healing waters that flows forward from you, healing all allies in its path.

In a timed scene, you use 'Wellspring'.

Wellspring

When you spend an action and 2 MP to unleash a wave, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You unleash a wave that affects a 5-square cone. All allies in the cone heal for your MD.
  • On a 9-15: The cone is only 3 squares long.
  • On a 1-8: The wave is weak and only heals adjacent allies for half your MD.

name: Ancestral Protection Totem
description:
You summon a totem that grants allies a protective ward from the ancestors, increasing their health.

In a timed scene, you use 'Ancestral Protection Totem'.

Ancestral Protection Totem

When you place a totem in an adjacent empty square, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The totem lasts for 3 rounds. While it is active, all allies within a 3-square radius have their maximum HP increased by 10.
  • On a 9-15: The totem lasts for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The totem only affects you.

name: Tidal Waves
description:
Casting your Chain Heal or Riptide makes your subsequent Healing Wave faster and more likely to be critical.

Tidal Waves

(Passive)

When you cast Chain Heal or Riptide, you gain a stack of Tidal Waves (max 2). Each stack increases the critical strike chance of your next Healing Wave by 10% and reduces its MP cost by 1. Consumes all stacks.

name: Resurgence
description:
Your direct heals have a chance to leave a minor regenerative effect on your target.

Resurgence

(Passive)

When you successfully heal a target with Healing Wave or Chain Heal, roll a d6. On a 5 or 6, the target also receives a minor Rejuvenation, healing them for 1d4 HP at the start of their next 2 turns.

name: Earth Shield
description:
You can surround an ally with a shield of living earth that heals them whenever they are struck.

Earth Shield

(Passive)

As a free action on your turn, you can place an Earth Shield on one ally within 8 squares. The shield has 5 charges. Each time that ally takes damage, a charge is consumed and they heal for 1d6 HP. The shield lasts until all charges are consumed. You can only have one Earth Shield active at a time.

name: Ancestral Guidance
description:
Once per day, when you would roll a Low Hit (1-8), you may ask the spirits for guidance and treat the result as a Medium Hit (9-15) instead.

Ancestral Guidance

(Passive)

Once per day, when you would roll a Low Hit (1-8) on any roll, you may ask the spirits for guidance and treat the result as a Medium Hit (9-15) instead.

name: Deluge
description:
Your Chain Heal is more effective on targets standing within your Healing Rain.

Deluge

(Passive)

Allies who are standing inside your Healing Rain receive 20% more healing from your Chain Heal.

name: Undulation
description:
Your healing waves ebb and flow, creating a rhythm where every third wave is significantly more powerful.

Undulation

(Passive)

Every third Healing Wave you cast on any target heals for an additional 50%.

name: Graceful Spirit
description:
Your Spiritwalker's Grace also grants you a protective spiritual aura, making you harder to harm.

Graceful Spirit

(Passive)

While your Spiritwalker's Grace feature is active, you gain +2 Armor.

name: Crashing Waves
description:
The undertow of your Riptide empowers your chained heals.

Crashing Waves

(Passive)

When you heal a target that is currently affected by your Riptide with Chain Heal, the initial heal is increased by +5, and it can leap one additional time.

name: Tidal Chains
description:
Your Chain Heal flows more efficiently between allies who are close together.

Tidal Chains

(Passive)

The healing reduction of your Chain Heal as it jumps between targets is halved if the next target is adjacent to the previous one.

name: Living Stream
description:
Your Healing Stream Totem is infused with potent life energy, granting it an extra healing pulse when summoned.

Living Stream

(Passive)

When you summon your Healing Stream Totem, it immediately releases a pulse, healing all allies within its radius for 1d8 HP. This is in addition to its normal effects.

name: Starsurge
description:
You call down a burst of stellar energy that empowers your connection to the sun and moon.

In a timed scene, you use 'Starsurge'.

Starsurge

When you attack a target within 8 squares, spend 2 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD + 5 as magical damage. You gain 2 stacks of Empowerment, reducing the MP cost of your next two Wrath or Moonfire spells by 1.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD + 5. You gain 1 stack of Empowerment.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your MD.

name: Starfall
description:
You call down a shower of stars over an area, searing any enemies who pass through the celestial rain.

In a timed scene, you use 'Starfall'.

Starfall

When you spend your action and 3 MP, choose a 3x3 square area within 8 squares. Roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The area is showered with stars for 3 rounds. Any enemy who starts their turn in the area takes half your MD as magical damage and is Weakened for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: The starfall lasts for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The starfall lasts for 2 rounds, but its area is difficult terrain for everyone, including allies.

name: Celestial Alignment
description:
You align yourself with the movement of the heavens, entering a state of pure astral power.

In a timed scene, you use 'Celestial Alignment'.

Celestial Alignment

Once per day, when you spend your action to align with the stars, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: For 3 rounds, all your magical damage is increased by +5, and all your damaging spells are guaranteed High Hits (16+).
  • On a 9-15: The effect lasts for only 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The power is too great to contain. You are Stunned for 1 round.

name: Force of Nature
description:
You summon astral-infused spirits of the forest to temporarily aid you in battle.

In a timed scene, you use 'Force of Nature'.

Force of Nature

When you spend an action and 2 MP to summon spirits, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You summon two Treants in empty squares within 5 squares. They last for 3 rounds, have 10 HP, and their basic attacks deal 1d8 HD and Taunt their target for 1 round on a hit.
  • On a 9-15: You summon one Treant that lasts for 3 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The summoning is weak. You summon one Treant, but it only has 5 HP and lasts for 1 round.

name: Sun and Moon
description:
You can call down a beam of either solar or lunar energy, with different effects.

In a timed scene, you choose which beam to call.

Sun and Moon

When you spend an action and 2 MP, choose an effect and roll+INT.

  • Sunbeam: Target a square. A beam of light illuminates it for 2 rounds. Any enemy starting their turn there is Blinded and Deafened for 1 round.
  • Moonbeam: Target a square. A beam of moonlight strikes it, dealing your MD to any creature in the square. You can use your action on subsequent turns to move the beam up to 3 squares.

name: Eclipse
description:
Your magic ebbs and flows between the arcane and the natural, empowering each in turn.

Eclipse

(Passive)

After you successfully cast two spells that deal Nature damage (like Wrath), you enter a Lunar Eclipse for 2 rounds, increasing the damage of your Arcane spells (like Moonfire) by +3. After you cast two Arcane spells, you enter a Solar Eclipse for 2 rounds, increasing the damage of your Nature spells by +3.

name: Stellar Drift
description:
You have learned to maintain your celestial downpour while on the move.

Stellar Drift

(Passive)

You may move up to half your SPEED while channeling your Starfall ability without it ending.

name: Astral Influence
description:
Your connection to the cosmos allows you to cast your spells from a much greater distance.

Astral Influence

(Passive)

The range of all your spells is permanently increased by 2 squares.

name: Shooting Stars
description:
The lingering energy of your damage-over-time effects has a chance to manifest as a falling star.

Shooting Stars

(Passive)

Whenever your Moonfire or Sunfire deals damage at the start of an enemy's turn, roll a d6. On a 6, a star falls from the sky, dealing 1d8 magical damage to the target.

name: Mastery: Starlight
description:
The power of the stars and moon infuses your very being, strengthening your astral magic.

Mastery: Starlight

(Passive)

The damage of your Starsurge and Starfall abilities is permanently increased by +3.

name: Wild Growth
description:
You cause a burst of life-giving energy to erupt, healing a target and several nearby allies over time.

In a timed scene, you use 'Wild Growth'.

Wild Growth

When you target an ally within 8 squares, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: Your target and up to four other allies within 4 squares of them are healed for 1d8 HP over 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: The effect heals the primary target and up to two other allies.
  • On a 1-8: The effect only heals the primary target.

name: Lifebloom
description:
You place a potent, single-target heal-over-time effect that bursts with a final surge of healing when it expires.

In a timed scene, you use 'Lifebloom'.

Lifebloom

When you touch an ally to heal them, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The ally heals 1d6 HP at the start of their next 3 turns. When the effect ends, it bursts, healing them for an additional 2d6 HP.
  • On a 9-15: The effect heals 1d6 for 2 turns, with a final burst of 2d6.
  • On a 1-8: The effect only heals 1d6 for 2 turns and has no final burst.

name: Ironbark
description:
You cause an ally's skin to become as tough as the bark of an ancient ironwood tree, reducing all damage they take.

In a timed scene, you use 'Ironbark'.

Ironbark

When you spend an action to harden an ally's skin within 8 squares, roll+CON.

  • On a 16+: The target gains +2 Armor and reduces all damage taken by 2 for 3 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: The target gains +2 Armor for 3 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The target gains +1 Armor for 2 rounds.

name: Efflorescence
description:
You grow a patch of healing flora at a location on the ground, mending the wounds of allies who stand within it.

In a timed scene, you use 'Efflorescence'.

Efflorescence

When you spend an action and 2 MP, choose an empty square within 8 squares. Roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You grow a 3-square radius patch of healing flowers for 3 rounds. Up to three allies who start their turn in the area heal 1d8 HP.
  • On a 9-15: The patch lasts for 2 rounds and heals 1d8 HP.
  • On a 1-8: The patch lasts for 2 rounds but only heals 1d4 HP.

name: Tranquility
description:
You enter a meditative state, channeling a wave of profound peace and healing over all nearby allies.

In a timed scene, you use 'Tranquility'.

Tranquility

Once per day, when you spend your action and 3 MP to channel a wave of healing, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: All allies within a 5-square radius heal for your MD + 5. You can continue to channel this for up to 3 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: All allies within 3 squares heal for your MD. You can continue to channel next turn.
  • On a 1-8: The healing is unfocused. All allies heal for half your MD, and the channel ends.

name: Swiftmend
description:
You consume one of your own healing-over-time effects on an ally to instantly heal them for a large amount.

Swiftmend

(Passive)

As a free action on your turn, you can choose an ally currently affected by your Rejuvenation or Wild Growth. The effect is consumed, and the target instantly heals for 2d10 HP. This can only be used once per round.

name: Mastery: Harmony
description:
Your healing is amplified for each of your restorative spells active on a target.

Mastery: Harmony

(Passive)

Your direct healing on a target is increased by +2 for each of your healing-over-time effects currently active on them (e.g., Rejuvenation, Lifebloom).

name: Living Seed
description:
Your most potent heals plant a seed of life, offering a burst of healing when it is needed most.

Living Seed

(Passive)

When you cast a healing spell on an ally and the result is a High Hit (16+), you plant a Living Seed on them. The next time that ally takes damage, the seed is consumed and they immediately heal for an amount equal to your MD.

name: Abundance
description:
As you spread your healing energies, your spells become easier to cast.

Abundance

(Passive)

For each Rejuvenation you have active on your allies, your Healing Wave spell costs 1 less MP (to a minimum of 1).

name: Nature's Cure
description:
Your healing magic is infused with nature's purifying essence, cleansing afflictions as it mends flesh.

Nature's Cure

(Passive)

Whenever you cast a healing spell on an ally that restores HP, roll a d6. On a 5 or 6, you may also remove one Poisoned or disease condition from that ally.

name: Holy Shock
description:
You unleash a blast of Holy Light that can either heal an ally or damage an enemy.

In a timed scene, you use 'Holy Shock'.

Holy Shock

When you target a creature within 8 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You may choose: Heal an ally for your MD + 5, OR deal your MD + 5 as magical damage to an enemy. This spell is a guaranteed critical effect (double healing or damage).
  • On a 9-15: Heal an ally for your MD OR deal your MD to an enemy.
  • On a 1-8: Heal an ally for half your MD OR deal half your MD to an enemy.

name: Light of Dawn
description:
You release a frontal wave of holy energy, healing allies in its path.

In a timed scene, you use 'Light of Dawn'.

Light of Dawn

When you spend an action and 2 MP to unleash a wave, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You unleash a wave that affects a 5-square cone. Up to five allies in the cone heal for your MD.
  • On a 9-15: The cone is only 3 squares long and heals up to three allies.
  • On a 1-8: The wave is weak and only heals up to two adjacent allies for half your MD.

name: Beacon of Light
description:
You mark an ally as a Beacon of Light, causing them to receive a portion of all other healing you perform.

In a timed scene, you use 'Beacon of Light'.

Beacon of Light

When you spend an action and 2 MP to mark an ally within 8 squares, that ally becomes your Beacon of Light for the rest of combat. Whenever you heal another ally, your Beacon is also healed for 50% of the amount. You can only have one Beacon active at a time.

name: Avenging Wrath
description:
You call upon the Light to grant you immense power, sprouting ethereal wings and becoming a true avatar of healing.

In a timed scene, you use 'Avenging Wrath'.

Avenging Wrath

Once per day, when you spend your action to ascend, roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: For 3 rounds, your healing is increased by 50%, and all your healing spells are guaranteed critical effects (double healing).
  • On a 9-15: The effect lasts for only 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The power is too great to contain. You are Stunned for 1 round.

name: Divine Favor
description:
You pray for divine intervention, allowing your next few spells to be cast with incredible speed and potency.

In a timed scene, you use 'Divine Favor'.

Divine Favor

When you spend your action to pray, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: Your next three healing spells are instant (free actions).
  • On a 9-15: Your next two healing spells are instant.
  • On a 1-8: Your next healing spell is instant, but its MP cost is doubled.

name: Infusion of Light
description:
Your critical heals infuse you with the power of the Light, making your most common heal faster and cheaper.

Infusion of Light

(Passive)

When your Holy Shock results in a critical effect, you gain Infusion of Light. Your next Holy Light spell costs 1 less MP and has its cast time reduced to a free action.

name: Light's Grace
description:
Each time you directly heal an ally, you build the Light's grace upon them, reducing the damage they take.

Light's Grace

(Passive)

When you successfully heal an ally with a spell, they gain a stack of Light's Grace. Each stack reduces the next damage they take by 1 (max 5 stacks). Taking damage consumes all stacks.

name: Divine Illumination
description:
Your critical heals not only restore the body, but also the spirit, replenishing your own magical energy.

Divine Illumination

(Passive)

When you score a critical effect with a healing spell, you regain 1 MP.

name: Aura Mastery
description:
You have mastered the control of your holy auras, allowing you to project their power over a much larger area.

Aura Mastery

(Passive)

The radius of all your Aura features is permanently increased by 2 squares.

name: Unwavering Faith
description:
Your faith is your shield. The lower your health, the more the Light rushes to mend your wounds.

Unwavering Faith

(Passive)

The amount of healing you receive from all sources is increased by 25% while you are below half of your maximum HP.

name: Crusader Strike
description:
A quick, reliable strike that builds your Holy Power.

This is a Holy Power generator.

Crusader Strike

(Builder) When you attack an enemy in melee, roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD and generate 2 Holy Power.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD and generate 1 Holy Power.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half HD and generate 1 Holy Power.

name: Templar's Verdict
description:
You unleash your stored Holy Power in a massive, decisive blow with your weapon.

This finisher spends Holy Power.

Templar's Verdict

(Finisher) When you have at least 1 Holy Power, you can spend your action and all charges to attack an enemy in melee.

You deal your HD as magical damage, plus an additional 1d10 magical damage for each Holy Power spent. This move does not require a roll.

name: Divine Storm
description:
You unleash your Holy Power in a whirlwind of divine energy, striking all nearby foes.

This finisher spends Holy Power.

Divine Storm

(Finisher) When you have at least 1 Holy Power, you can spend your action and all charges.

You deal half your HD as magical damage to all adjacent enemies, plus an additional 1d6 magical damage for each Holy Power spent. This move does not require a roll.

name: Wake of Ashes
description:
You erupt with simmering light, damaging and dazing all enemies in front of you.

In a timed scene, you use 'Wake of Ashes'.

Wake of Ashes

When you spend an action to unleash a wave of light, roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD to all enemies in a 4-square cone and generate 3 Holy Power. If their CON is less than your STR, they are also Stunned for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: You deal half your MD to all enemies in the cone and generate 2 Holy Power.
  • On a 1-8: You only generate 1 Holy Power.

name: Blade of Justice
description:
You pierce an enemy with a blade of pure light, generating holy power from a distance.

This is a Holy Power generator.

Blade of Justice

(Builder) When you attack an enemy within 6 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD and generate 2 Holy Power.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD and generate 1 Holy Power.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your MD.

name: Art of War
description:
Your auto-attacks have a chance to reset the cooldown of Blade of Justice.

Art of War

(Passive)

When you successfully deal HD with a Hack & Slash attack, roll a d6. On a 5 or 6, your next Blade of Justice this combat costs 0 MP and can be used as a free action.

name: Righteous Verdict
description:
Your Templar's Verdict strikes with such force that it empowers your next one.

Righteous Verdict

(Passive)

When you successfully use Templar's Verdict, roll a d6. On a 4, 5, or 6, your next Templar's Verdict costs 1 less Holy Power.

name: Seal of Command
description:
You permanently imbue your weapon with a holy seal, causing it to periodically erupt with divine energy.

Seal of Command

(Passive)

When you successfully deal HD with a Hack & Slash attack, roll a d6. On a 5 or 6, your attack deals an additional 1d8 magical damage.

name: Zeal
description:
Your Crusader Strike has a chance to strike with such zeal that it hits an additional time.

Zeal

(Passive)

When you successfully use Crusader Strike, roll a d6. On a 5 or 6, your strike hits an additional time for half your HD.

name: Divine Purpose
description:
Your Holy Power spenders have a chance to make your next one free and more powerful.

Divine Purpose

(Passive)

When you successfully use a Finisher that spends Holy Power, roll a d6. On a 6, your next Finisher costs 0 Holy Power and is treated as if you spent 3 Holy Power.

name: Penance
description:
You launch a volley of holy or shadow energy that can either harm a foe or mend an ally.

In a timed scene, you use 'Penance'.

Penance

When you spend your action and 2 MP to channel energy at a target within 8 squares, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: Choose one: Deal three bolts of 1d6+1 magical damage to an enemy, OR heal an ally for three bursts of 1d6+1 HP.
  • On a 9-15: Deal two bolts of 1d6+1 damage OR heal for two bursts of 1d6+1 HP.
  • On a 1-8: Deal one bolt of 1d6+1 damage OR heal for one burst of 1d6+1 HP.

name: Power Word Shield
description:
You create a bubble of divine energy around an ally, absorbing incoming damage. It leaves them temporarily unable to be shielded again.

In a timed scene, you use 'Power Word Shield'.

Power Word Shield

(Reaction) When an ally within 8 squares is hit by an attack, you can spend your reaction and 1 MP to shield them. Roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The shield absorbs an amount of damage equal to your MD + 8. The target cannot be shielded again for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: The shield absorbs an amount of damage equal to your MD. The target cannot be shielded again for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The shield is weak and absorbs only 1d6 damage.

name: Smite
description:
You smite a foe with holy energy, a basic attack that fuels your Atonement healing.

In a timed scene, you use 'Smite'.

Smite

When you attack a target within 8 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD + 3 as magical damage and absorb some of their essence, reducing the MP cost of your next Penance by 1.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your MD.

name: Power Word Radiance
description:
A burst of light heals a target and several nearby allies, applying your Atonement to all of them.

In a timed scene, you use 'Power Word Radiance'.

Power Word Radiance

When you target an ally within 8 squares, spend 3 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The target and up to four other allies within 4 squares heal for 1d8 HP and gain your Atonement effect for 3 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: The target and up to two other allies heal for 1d8 and gain Atonement for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: Only the primary target heals for 1d8 and gains Atonement for 1 round.

name: Pain Suppression
description:
You instantly suppress the pain of an ally, drastically reducing the damage they take for a short time.

In a timed scene, you use 'Pain Suppression'.

Pain Suppression

(Reaction) When an ally within 8 squares is hit by an attack, you can spend your reaction and 2 MP. Roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The damage the ally takes from the attack is reduced by 50%, and all further damage they take for 2 rounds is reduced by 25%.
  • On a 9-15: The damage from the triggering attack is reduced by 50%.
  • On a 1-8: The effect is weak and only reduces the damage by 25%.

name: Atonement
description:
You have mastered the art of healing through penance. Your offensive spells mend the wounds of your allies.

Atonement

(Passive)

Allies affected by your Power Word Shield or Power Word Radiance gain the Atonement buff. When you deal damage with a spell, all allies with Atonement are healed for 50% of the damage dealt.

name: Rapture
description:
For a short time, your Power Word Shield becomes incredibly powerful and can be cast without a cooldown.

Rapture

(Passive)

Once per combat, as a free action, you can enter a state of Rapture for 2 rounds. While active, your Power Word Shield absorbs 50% more damage and does not apply its temporary 'cannot be shielded again' debuff.

name: Grace
description:
Your direct healing spells leave a lingering blessing, increasing the effectiveness of all further healing on that target.

Grace

(Passive)

When you heal an ally with a spell, they gain Grace for 2 rounds. While active, all healing they receive from any source is increased by +2. This effect does not stack.

name: Contrition
description:
When you heal an ally who has Atonement, their wounds are mended with a small burst of light.

Contrition

(Passive)

When you heal an ally who is currently affected by your Atonement with a direct healing spell, they are healed for an additional 1d6 HP.

name: Schism
description:
You blast a target with a burst of shadow, tearing open their soul to your damaging spells.

Schism

(Passive)

Once per round, you may use this ability. Your next Smite spell instead becomes Schism. It deals your MD as shadow damage, and for the next 2 rounds, the target takes +50% damage from all your spells.

name: Heal
description:
A slow but powerful and efficient prayer that mends an ally's wounds.

In a timed scene, you use 'Heal'.

Heal

When you spend an action to heal an ally within 8 squares, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The target heals for your MD + 15.
  • On a 9-15: The target heals for your MD + 10.
  • On a 1-8: The target heals for your MD.

name: Flash Heal
description:
A quick but mana-intensive prayer that provides a burst of healing.

In a timed scene, you use 'Flash Heal'.

Flash Heal

When you spend an action to heal an ally within 8 squares, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The target heals for your MD + 5.
  • On a 9-15: The target heals for your MD.
  • On a 1-8: The target heals for half your MD.

name: Circle of Healing
description:
You create a circle of holy energy that heals a target and their closest allies.

In a timed scene, you use 'Circle of Healing'.

Circle of Healing

When you target an ally within 8 squares, spend 3 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The target and up to four other allies within 4 squares heal for your MD.
  • On a 9-15: The target and up to two other allies heal for your MD.
  • On a 1-8: Only the primary target heals for your MD.

name: Holy Word: Serenity
description:
A divine word of immense power that provides a massive, single-target heal.

In a timed scene, you use 'Holy Word: Serenity'.

Holy Word: Serenity

When you spend an action to heal an ally within 8 squares, spend 2 SP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The target heals for 3x your MD.
  • On a 9-15: The target heals for 2x your MD.
  • On a 1-8: The target heals for your MD.

name: Holy Word: Sanctify
description:
A divine word that sanctifies an area with a burst of healing light.

In a timed scene, you use 'Holy Word: Sanctify'.

Holy Word: Sanctify

When you spend an action and 2 SP, choose a square within 8 squares. Roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: A burst of light erupts. All allies in a 3-square radius heal for 2x your MD.
  • On a 9-15: All allies in a 2-square radius heal for 2x your MD.
  • On a 1-8: All allies in a 2-square radius heal for your MD.

name: Guardian Spirit
description:
You summon a spirit to watch over an ally, saving them from death and amplifying all healing they receive.

Guardian Spirit

(Passive)

Once per combat, as a free action, you can place a Guardian Spirit on an ally for 3 rounds. For the duration, all healing they receive from any source is doubled. If the target would take fatal damage, the spirit is consumed, and they are instead healed for 50% of their maximum HP.

name: Serendipity
description:
Casting your quick heals makes your slow, powerful heal faster.

Serendipity

(Passive)

When you cast Flash Heal, the MP cost of your next Heal spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack up to two times.

name: Echo of Light
description:
Your direct healing spells leave behind an echo of holy light, continuing to heal the target for a short time.

Echo of Light

(Passive)

When you successfully heal a target with a spell, they also receive a heal-over-time effect, healing them for 20% of the initial heal amount over the next 2 rounds.

name: Divine Hymn
description:
You channel a powerful hymn of holy energy, healing all nearby allies and increasing the healing they receive.

Divine Hymn

(Passive)

Your 'Divine Hymn' feature is empowered. In addition to its normal healing, for its duration, all allies affected by it receive 10% more healing from all sources.

name: Symbol of Hope
description:
You raise your holy symbol and channel a prayer of hope, restoring the fighting spirit of all nearby healers.

Symbol of Hope

(Passive)

Once per combat, as an action, you can raise your holy symbol. All allies (including yourself) within a 5-square radius who have MP immediately regain 2d6 MP.

name: The Patriarch's Shadow
description: Your father, a stern and respected military commander named Kaelen / Alaric / Borin, raised you. He taught you discipline and duty, but his expectations cast a long shadow. Your mother, Lyra / Seraphina / Isolde, was a gentler soul who often tried to soften his hard edges. You have a sibling who either eagerly followed in your father's footsteps or rebelled completely.

name: A Single Parent's Hope
description: You were raised by a single mother, Linnea / Fiora / Anya, a herbalist who worked tirelessly to provide for you. You never knew your father. Life was a struggle, but your mother's resilience and deep knowledge of the natural world were your greatest lessons. She poured all her hopes for a better life into you.

name: Adopted by a Master
description: Whether you were an orphan or simply showed promise, you were taken in and raised by a master of a specific craft—a blacksmith, a wizard, an alchemist named Elminster / Gerhardt / Isabella. This mentor was your only family, and your home was their workshop. Your upbringing was a relentless apprenticeship, focused entirely on honing a single, exceptional skill.

name: Raised by the Guild
description: You were an orphan taken in by a powerful guild—of thieves, merchants, or artisans. The guild master, Jax / Lady Amara / Corvus, was your de facto parent. Your 'siblings' were the other apprentices and members. You were raised with the guild's code as your only creed, taught that loyalty to the organization is the only family bond that matters.

name: The Matriarch's Web
description: Your family is commanded by your formidable grandmother, Eleonora / Morwen / Seraphine. While your parents, Gareth and Lyra, handle the day-to-day, it is the matriarch who pulls the strings. You grew up in a household of whispers, political maneuvering, and carefully arranged marriages, taught that influence is the sharpest weapon.

name: A Loving, Crowded Home
description: You grew up in a small, bustling home with your parents, Baran and Anya, and at least four siblings. There was never much money or privacy, but always an abundance of love, noise, and shared meals. You learned to share, to stand up for your younger siblings, and to find quiet moments in the heart of chaos.

name: Raised by Grandparents
description: Your parents were lost to war or tragedy when you were young, and you were raised by your grandparents, Elara and Stellan. They were keepers of old traditions and stories. Your grandmother taught you remedies from the garden, and your grandfather told tales of heroes and monsters from a bygone age. Your upbringing was quiet, gentle, and steeped in the wisdom of the past.

name: The Circus Family
description: You were born on the road, part of a sprawling, chaotic circus family. Your 'father' was the ringmaster, Silas, your 'mother' the fortune teller, Madame Eva, and your 'siblings' were the acrobats and beast tamers. You were raised on applause and sawdust, and your family is a bizarre collection of outsiders who look out for their own.

name: Exiled Bloodline
description: Your family carries a dark secret or a forbidden magical bloodline. Generations ago, your ancestor—Sorcerer Thrax / the Witch of the Fen / the Nameless One—made a pact they shouldn't have. Your family lives in self-imposed exile, constantly hiding their true nature and fearing the day their past catches up to them. You were raised with a mix of pride and terror in your heritage.

name: The Absent Parents
description: Your parents, Lord Valerius and Lady Isolde, were wealthy and influential but emotionally distant. You were raised primarily by a kind-hearted nanny or steward named Elspeth / Gregor / Finnian. You had every material comfort but lacked genuine affection from your parents, forcing you to become independent and resourceful from a very young age.

name: Sinister Strike
description:
A vicious, opportunistic strike that builds momentum for a more powerful finishing move.

In a timed scene, you use 'Sinister Strike'.

Sinister Strike

(Builder) When you attack an enemy in melee with a precise weapon, roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD + 3 damage and generate 2 Combo Points.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD and generate 1 Combo Point.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your HD, but generate 1 Combo Point as you learn from your clumsy attack.

name: Eviscerate
description:
You use your momentum to unleash a brutal, disemboweling finishing move that can punch through armor.

This move's damage scales with the number of Combo Points on the target.

Eviscerate

(Finisher) When you have at least 1 Combo Point on a target, you can use your action and spend 1 SP.

You deal your character's HD, plus an additional 1d6 physical damage for each Combo Point spent on the target. If you spent 4 or more points, this attack ignores armor. All Combo Points are consumed. This move does not require a roll.

name: Stealth
description:
You melt into the shadows, becoming unseen. Your silence is supernatural; you never need to Defy Danger to move quietly.

In a timed scene, you use 'Stealth'.

Stealth

When you attempt to hide in shadows or dim light, roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: You become Invisible. You can move up to half your SPEED each turn and remain invisible until you attack or enter bright light.
  • On a 9-15: You become Invisible, but you must remain stationary to maintain the effect.
  • On a 1-8: You are hidden from view, but any sudden movement will reveal you. You have disadvantage on your next attack if you move first.

name: Shadowstep
description:
You step through the shadows to appear instantly behind your target, setting up a devastating attack.

In a timed scene, you use 'Shadowstep'.

Shadowstep
