When you spend 1 MP to teleport, choose an enemy you can see within 6 squares. Roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: You instantly Shift to an empty square adjacent to the target. Your next attack against them this turn is a guaranteed High Hit (16+).
  • On a 9-15: You instantly Shift to an empty square adjacent to the target.
  • On a 1-8: You appear in a random square adjacent to the target and are Weakened for 1 round.

name: Vanish
description:
In a puff of smoke, you disappear from sight, allowing for a swift and safe escape.

In a timed scene, you use 'Vanish'.

Vanish

When you spend 2 SP to escape combat, roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: You succeed perfectly. You immediately become Invisible and may Shift up to your full SPEED. You are no longer in combat.
  • On a 9-15: You escape. You become Invisible, but you cannot move from your current square until your next turn.
  • On a 1-8: Your smoke bomb fizzles. You become Invisible for 1 round, but all enemies know your location and have advantage to hit you.

name: Kidney Shot
description:
A cheap but effective blow to a vital organ, incapacitating your foe.

This is a finisher that spends Combo Points.

Kidney Shot

(Finisher) When you have at least 1 Combo Point on a target, you can use your action.

You deal no damage. The target is Stunned for a number of rounds equal to the Combo Points spent. All Combo Points are consumed. This move does not require a roll.

name: Poisoned Knife
description:
You coat your blade in a fast-acting toxin, ensuring your next strike leaves a festering wound.

In a timed scene, you use 'Poisoned Knife'.

Poisoned Knife

When you spend an action to apply poison to a weapon, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The poison is potent. Your next two successful attacks apply a Poisoned effect that deals 1d6 damage for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: Your next successful attack applies a Poisoned effect that deals 1d4 damage for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The poison is weak. Your next successful attack applies a Poisoned effect that deals 1d4 damage for 1 round.

name: Kick
description:
A swift kick to an enemy spellcaster can interrupt their incantation and leave them vulnerable.

In a timed scene, you use 'Kick'.

Kick

(Reaction) When an enemy within 1 square of you begins to cast a spell, you can spend your reaction to kick them. Roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: The spell is interrupted and fails. The caster is Deafened for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: The spell is interrupted and fails.
  • On a 1-8: You interrupt the spell, but the backlash deals 1d4 magical damage to you.

name: Shadowy Duel
description:
You pull yourself and an enemy into the shadows, forcing them into a one-on-one duel where no one can interfere.

In a timed scene, you use 'Shadowy Duel'.

Shadowy Duel

When you target an enemy within 3 squares, spend 2 SP and roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: You and the target are pulled into a shadow realm for 3 rounds. No other creature can target or affect either of you, and neither of you can leave the duel. If the target's WIS is less than your CHA, they are Frightened for the duration.
  • On a 9-15: The duel lasts for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The duel only lasts for 1 round, and you are both revealed in a vulnerable state.

name: Pick Pocket
description:
You have a knack for lifting coin purses and other small valuables, even in the heat of battle.

In a timed scene, you use 'Pick Pocket'.

Pick Pocket

When you are adjacent to a humanoid target, you can use your action to attempt to steal a small item. Roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: You deftly snatch one item (a potion, a pouch, a key) without the target noticing.
  • On a 9-15: You get the item, but the target notices immediately.
  • On a 1-8: You get the item, but you are caught red-handed and the target can make a free Attack of Opportunity against you.

name: Devotion Aura
description:
You project an aura of holy resolve, inspiring courage and protecting the faithful. When your group must resist fear or intimidation, your presence grants them advantage on their roll.

In a timed scene, you use 'Devotion Aura'.

Devotion Aura

(Aura) When you activate this aura as an action, spend 1 SP and roll+CON.

  • On a 16+: For 3 rounds, you and all allies within 3 squares gain +2 Armor.
  • On a 9-15: For 3 rounds, you and all allies within 3 squares gain +1 Armor.
  • On a 1-8: The aura is weak, granting only you +1 Armor for 3 rounds.

You may only have one Aura active at a time.

name: Hammer of Wrath
description:
You hurl a magical hammer to strike a wounded foe, ideal for finishing off an enemy or destroying a weakened unholy artifact.

In a timed scene, you use 'Hammer of Wrath'.

Hammer of Wrath

When you target an enemy below half HP within 6 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The hammer strikes true, dealing your MD + 5 as magical damage. You may also Push 2 the target. If this causes a collision, it becomes a Crush 2.
  • On a 9-15: The hammer deals your MD + 5 and you may Push 1.
  • On a 1-8: The hammer deals your MD, but the effort leaves you unable to use this move again this combat.

name: Divine Steed
description:
You summon a celestial steed of pure light, allowing you to charge across the battlefield unimpeded.

In a timed scene, you use 'Divine Steed'.

Divine Steed

When you spend an action and 1 MP to summon your steed, roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: For 2 rounds, your SPEED is doubled. Your movement is a Shift and does not provoke Attacks of Opportunity. Your next melee attack after moving at least 4 squares deals an additional 1d8 damage.
  • On a 9-15: The effect lasts for only 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The steed is summoned but unruly. Your SPEED is doubled for 1 round, but your movement ends if you enter an enemy's space.

name: Ashen Hallow
description:
You consecrate a large area in glowing, hallowed ground that damages foes and aids allies who stand within it.

In a timed scene, you use 'Ashen Hallow'.

Ashen Hallow

When you spend your action and 3 MP to sanctify the ground, choose a 3x3 square area within 5 squares. Roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The area is hallowed for 3 rounds. Enemies who start their turn in the area take half your MD. Allies who start their turn in the area heal for half your MD.
  • On a 9-15: The hallow lasts for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The hallow is unstable. It lasts for 2 rounds, but only deals 1d4 damage to enemies and heals allies for 1d4 HP.

name: Blinding Light
description:
You emit a brilliant flash of holy light, disorienting and knocking back nearby enemies.

In a timed scene, you use 'Blinding Light'.

Blinding Light

When you spend 2 MP to unleash a flash of light, roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: All enemies in a 3-square radius are affected. If an enemy's WIS is less than your CHA, they are Blinded and knocked prone. Otherwise, they are Weakened and knocked prone.
  • On a 9-15: All adjacent enemies are Weakened for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The light flashes unpredictably, making you and one random ally Weakened for 1 round.

name: Hand of Protection
description:
You bless an ally with a shield of divine light, making them immune to physical harm. This blessing can be placed on an ally to allow them to automatically succeed on one Defy Danger roll against a physical trap or hazard, after which the blessing is consumed.

In a timed scene, you use 'Hand of Protection'.

Hand of Protection

When you bless an ally within 5 squares, spend 2 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The target is immune to all physical damage (HD) for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: The target is immune to all physical damage (HD) for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The shield is weak and only grants the target +2 Armor for 1 round.

name: Cleanse
description:
You use the power of the Light to purge an ally of poison, disease, or magical curses. This can be used as part of a 10-minute ritual to cure long-lasting or potent ailments.

In a timed scene, you use 'Cleanse'.

Cleanse

When you attempt to remove an ailment from a target within 5 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You successfully remove one Poisoned condition, disease, or magical curse.
  • On a 9-15: You remove the ailment, but the corrupt energy lashes out, dealing 1d4 magical damage to you.
  • On a 1-8: You only suppress the ailment for 1 round instead of removing it.

name: Turn Evil
description:
You present your holy symbol and command an undead or demonic creature to flee in terror. This can be used to pacify a restless spirit or force an unholy presence out of an area.

In a timed scene, you use 'Turn Evil'.

Turn Evil

When you target an Undead or Demonic creature within 5 squares, spend 1 SP and roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: The target is affected. If its WIS is less than your CHA, it is Frightened for 3 rounds. Otherwise, it is Frightened for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: The target is Weakened for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The creature is enraged by your attempt and gains +3 forward against you.

name: Hand of Freedom
description:
You bless an ally with freedom, making them immune to effects that would hinder their movement. This can be used to instantly unlock any non-magical lock or set of shackles on an ally.

In a timed scene, you use 'Hand of Freedom'.

Hand of Freedom

When you bless an ally within 5 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The ally is immediately cured of any Immobilized or Slowed conditions and is immune to them for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: The ally is cured of the conditions, but is not immune to future effects.
  • On a 1-8: The magic falters, only removing the Slowed condition but not Immobilized.

name: Arcane Missiles
description:
You launch a volley of magic projectiles that unerringly strike their target. This is a foundational spell for building arcane power.

In a timed scene, you use 'Arcane Missiles'.

Arcane Missiles

(Builder) When you launch arcane projectiles at an enemy within 8 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD + 3 as magical damage and gain 2 Arcane Charges (max 4).
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD and gain 1 Arcane Charge.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your MD and gain 1 Arcane Charge, but the chaotic energy leaves you Weakened for 1 round.

name: Arcane Barrage
description:
You consume your arcane power to unleash a powerful blast of energy that devastates your primary target and can be augmented to push them back.

This is a finisher that spends Arcane Charges.

Arcane Barrage

(Finisher) When you have at least 1 Arcane Charge, spend your action and all charges.

You deal your character's MD to your primary target. For each Arcane Charge spent, you deal an additional 1d6 magical damage. If you spent 4 charges, you may also Push 2 the target.

name: Frost Nova
description:
You create an explosion of ice at your feet, freezing and blasting back nearby enemies. This can also be used out of combat to freeze a liquid surface.

In a timed scene, you use 'Frost Nova'.

Frost Nova

When you spend 2 MP to unleash a ring of frost, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: All enemies in adjacent squares take 1d6 cold damage, are Immobilized for 1 round, and are knocked back (Push 1).
  • On a 9-15: All adjacent enemies are Immobilized for 1 round, but you deal no damage.
  • On a 1-8: The frost is weak. All adjacent creatures (including allies) are only Slowed for 1 round.

name: Shimmer
description:
You bend space and time, teleporting a short distance in the blink of an eye. This movement is a **Shift**, and does not provoke Attacks of Opportunity.

In a timed scene, you use 'Shimmer'.

Shimmer

When you use your magic to teleport, spend 1 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You instantly Shift to any empty square you can see within 4 squares. You can cast a spell immediately after as a free action.
  • On a 9-15: You instantly Shift to any empty square you can see within 4 squares.
  • On a 1-8: You appear in a random, dangerous location within 2 squares of your intended destination (GM's choice).

name: Cone of Cold
description:
You blast enemies in front of you with a cone of freezing air, damaging and slowing them to a crawl.

Cone of Cold

When you spend 2 MP to blast an area, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD as cold damage to all targets in a 4-square cone, and they are all Slowed for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: You deal half your MD to all targets in the cone, and they are Slowed for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The cold is unfocused. All creatures in the cone (including allies) are Slowed for 1 round, with no damage.

name: Polymorph
description:
You transform an enemy into a harmless animal, temporarily removing them from the fight. The spell can also be used on a willing ally for disguise or infiltration.

In a timed scene, you use 'Polymorph'.

Polymorph

When you attempt to transform an enemy within 6 squares into a sheep, spend 2 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The target is transformed into a harmless sheep for 3 rounds. If the target's WIS is less than your INT, the effect breaks only if they take damage equal to your INT score. Otherwise, any damage breaks it.
  • On a 9-15: The transformation lasts for only 1 round. The effect breaks if they take any damage.
  • On a 1-8: The spell backfires, transforming you into a sheep for 1 round.

name: Blizzard
description:
You summon a storm of ice and freezing wind over an area, damaging and slowing any who pass through it.

Blizzard

When you spend your action and 3 MP to summon a blizzard, choose a 3x3 square area within 8 squares. Roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The blizzard rages for 3 rounds. The area is difficult terrain. Any enemy who starts their turn in the area takes half your MD as cold damage and is Slowed for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: The blizzard lasts for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The blizzard lasts for 2 rounds, but its area is difficult terrain for everyone, including allies.

name: Time Warp
description:
You bend time itself, granting you and your allies a burst of incredible speed and power.

In a timed scene, you use 'Time Warp'.

Time Warp

Once per day, when you spend your action and 4 MP to warp time, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You and all allies within a 5-square radius immediately gain an extra Action this round.
  • On a 9-15: You and one chosen ally gain an extra Action.
  • On a 1-8: The spell is taxing. You gain an extra action, but you are Stunned for your entire next turn.

name: Evocation
description:
You can enter a state of profound focus, drawing ambient magical energy into yourself to replenish your power, though it is dangerous to do so in the heat of battle.

In a timed scene, you use 'Evocation'.

Evocation

When you spend your action to channel arcane energy, roll+CON.

  • On a 16+: You immediately regain 2d6 MP.
  • On a 9-15: You regain 1d8 MP.
  • On a 1-8: You regain 1d4 MP, but the strain leaves you Weakened for 1 round.

name: Wild Shape
description:
As a druid, you can shed your humanoid form to become a powerful beast, tapping into its primal strength, speed, or resilience.

In a timed scene, you use 'Wild Shape'.

Wild Shape

As an action, spend 1 MP to transform into a Bear or Cat form. Roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You master the form. For the rest of combat, you gain the form's full benefits:
    • Bear Form: Gain +10 temporary HP and +2 Armor. Your base HD becomes 1d10.
    • Cat Form: Gain +3 SPEED. Your HD attacks cause Bleeding for half your HD (rounded up) for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: You shift, but the transformation is taxing and lasts only 3 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The transformation is painful. You gain the benefits for only 1 round and take 1d4 damage.

name: Mark of the Wild
description:
Your bond with the wilds allows you to bestow nature's resilience upon your allies, marking them with a sigil of vitality.

In a timed scene, you use 'Mark of the Wild'.

Mark of the Wild

When you spend an action to bless your allies, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You and all allies within a 5-square radius gain +2 Armor for the duration of the combat.
  • On a 9-15: You and all allies within a 3-square radius gain +1 Armor for the duration of the combat.
  • On a 1-8: You and one chosen ally gain +1 Armor for 3 rounds.

name: Moonfire
description:
You call down a beam of lunar light to sear an enemy, burning them with arcane energy over time.

Moonfire

When you call upon the moon's power against a target within 8 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD. The target is also Burning, taking an additional 1d8 magical damage at the start of their next 2 turns.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD, and the target is Burning for 1 turn (1d6 magical damage).
  • On a 1-8: You only deal half your MD as the beam strikes a glancing blow.

name: Entangling Roots
description:
You summon thick, grasping roots from the earth to hold your enemy fast.

Entangling Roots

When you call roots to bind an enemy within 6 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The target is Immobilized for 3 rounds and takes half your HD (rounded up) at the start of each of its turns.
  • On a 9-15: The target is Immobilized for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The roots only manage to slow the target; they are Slowed for 2 rounds.

name: Rejuvenation
description:
You blanket an ally in a blanket of soothing natural energy, healing their wounds over time.

Rejuvenation

When you touch an ally to heal them, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The ally heals 1d8 HP instantly and regains an additional 1d8 HP at the start of their next 2 turns.
  • On a 9-15: The ally heals 1d6 HP at the start of their next 2 turns (no instant heal).
  • On a 1-8: The energy is weak, healing only 1d6 HP instantly.

name: Travel Form
description:
You shapeshift into a swift stag or cheetah, allowing you to cross vast distances with incredible speed.

In a timed scene, you use 'Travel Form'.

Travel Form

When you shift into a travel form, roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: For the next hour, your overland travel speed is doubled. In combat, your SPEED is increased by 4 squares.
  • On a 9-15: The effect only lasts for 10 minutes, or a SPEED increase of 3 in combat.
  • On a 1-8: You stumble during the transformation, increasing your SPEED by 2 but becoming Weakened for 1 round.

You cannot attack while in this form.

name: Mangle
description:
While in the form of a great beast, you deliver a savage blow that leaves your enemy vulnerable to further attacks.

This manifests as the 'Mangle' ability in Bear or Cat form.

Mangle

(Requires Bear or Cat Form) When you attack a target in melee, roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD. If the target's COS is less than your STR, they are Weakened for 2 rounds. All allies gain +3 forward against this target for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD. If the target's COS is less than your STR, they are Weakened for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your HD.

name: Rebirth
description:
You channel the very essence of life, allowing you to bring a fallen ally back from the brink of death, even in the midst of battle.

In a timed scene, you use 'Rebirth'.

Rebirth

When you spend your action and 3 MP to resurrect a dead ally within 3 squares, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: Your ally is returned to life with 75% of their maximum HP.
  • On a 9-15: Your ally is returned to life with 25% of their maximum HP.
  • On a 1-8: The ritual is taxing. Your ally is returned to life with 1 HP, and you are Stunned for 1 round.

name: Wrath
description:
You call upon the sun's power, hurling a bolt of solar energy at your foe. This is a druid's primary ranged attack.

In a timed scene, you use 'Wrath'.

Wrath

When you attack a target within 8 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD + 5 magical damage.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your MD.

name: Barkskin
description:
Your skin becomes as tough as the bark of an ancient ironwood tree, shrugging off blows that would fell others.

Barkskin

When you spend an action to harden your skin, roll+CON.

  • On a 16+: You gain +2 Armor for the rest of the combat.
  • On a 9-15: You gain +1 Armor for the rest of the combat.
  • On a 1-8: You gain +1 Armor, but only for the next 2 rounds.

name: Holy Shock
description:
You unleash a blast of Holy Light that can either heal an ally or damage an enemy.

In a timed scene, you use 'Holy Shock'.

Holy Shock

When you target a creature within 8 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You may choose: Heal an ally for your MD + 5, OR deal your MD + 5 as magical damage to an enemy. This spell is a guaranteed critical effect (double healing or damage).
  • On a 9-15: Heal an ally for your MD OR deal your MD to an enemy.
  • On a 1-8: Heal an ally for half your MD OR deal half your MD to an enemy.

name: Light of Dawn
description:
You release a frontal wave of holy energy, healing allies in its path.

In a timed scene, you use 'Light of Dawn'.

Light of Dawn

When you spend an action and 2 MP to unleash a wave, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You unleash a wave that affects a 5-square cone. Up to five allies in the cone heal for your MD.
  • On a 9-15: The cone is only 3 squares long and heals up to three allies.
  • On a 1-8: The wave is weak and only heals up to two adjacent allies for half your MD.

name: Beacon of Light
description:
You mark an ally as a Beacon of Light, causing them to receive a portion of all other healing you perform.

In a timed scene, you use 'Beacon of Light'.

Beacon of Light

When you spend an action and 2 MP to mark an ally within 8 squares, that ally becomes your Beacon of Light for the rest of combat. Whenever you heal another ally, your Beacon is also healed for 50% of the amount. You can only have one Beacon active at a time.

name: Avenging Wrath
description:
You call upon the Light to grant you immense power, sprouting ethereal wings and becoming a true avatar of healing.

In a timed scene, you use 'Avenging Wrath'.

Avenging Wrath

Once per day, when you spend your action to ascend, roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: For 3 rounds, your healing is increased by 50%, and all your healing spells are guaranteed critical effects (double healing).
  • On a 9-15: The effect lasts for only 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The power is too great to contain. You are Stunned for 1 round.

name: Divine Favor
description:
You pray for divine intervention, allowing your next few spells to be cast with incredible speed and potency.

In a timed scene, you use 'Divine Favor'.

Divine Favor

When you spend your action to pray, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: Your next three healing spells are instant (free actions).
  • On a 9-15: Your next two healing spells are instant.
  • On a 1-8: Your next healing spell is instant, but its MP cost is doubled.

name: Infusion of Light
description:
Your critical heals infuse you with the power of the Light, making your most common heal faster and cheaper.

Infusion of Light

(Passive)

When your Holy Shock results in a critical effect, you gain Infusion of Light. Your next Holy Light spell costs 1 less MP and has its cast time reduced to a free action.

name: Light's Grace
description:
Each time you directly heal an ally, you build the Light's grace upon them, reducing the damage they take.

Light's Grace

(Passive)

When you successfully heal an ally with a spell, they gain a stack of Light's Grace. Each stack reduces the next damage they take by 1 (max 5 stacks). Taking damage consumes all stacks.

name: Divine Illumination
description:
Your critical heals not only restore the body, but also the spirit, replenishing your own magical energy.

Divine Illumination

(Passive)

When you score a critical effect with a healing spell, you regain 1 MP.

name: Aura Mastery
description:
You have mastered the control of your holy auras, allowing you to project their power over a much larger area.

Aura Mastery

(Passive)

The radius of all your Aura features is permanently increased by 2 squares.

name: Unwavering Faith
description:
Your faith is your shield. The lower your health, the more the Light rushes to mend your wounds.

Unwavering Faith

(Passive)

The amount of healing you receive from all sources is increased by 25% while you are below half of your maximum HP.

name: Avenger's Shield
description:
You hurl your shield, imbued with holy energy, to strike multiple foes before it ricochets back to you.

This move requires a shield to be equipped.

Avenger's Shield

When you throw your shield at a target within 6 squares, spend 1 MP and roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD to the primary target. The shield then bounces to up to two other enemies within 3 squares, dealing half your HD to each before returning to your hand. All targets hit are Deafened for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD to the primary target, and it bounces to one other enemy for half HD.
  • On a 1-8: You only hit your primary target for half HD, and the shield clatters to the ground in their square.

name: Shield of the Righteous
description:
You bash a foe with your shield, releasing a wave of holy energy that bolsters your defenses.

This move requires a shield to be equipped.

Shield of the Righteous

When you attack an enemy in melee with your shield, spend 1 MP and roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD as magical damage. You gain +2 Armor for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD and gain +1 Armor for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half HD, but the jarring impact leaves you Weakened for 1 round.

name: Ardent Defender
description:
You become a beacon of protection, drawing upon the Light to survive an otherwise fatal blow.

In a timed scene, you use 'Ardent Defender'.

Ardent Defender

(Reaction) Once per day, when an attack would reduce you to 0 HP, you can spend your reaction to use this ability. You are instead left with 1 HP and become immune to all damage for 1 round.

name: Guardian of Ancient Kings
description:
You summon an ancient spirit of a kingly guardian to protect you, absorbing a massive amount of damage.

In a timed scene, you use 'Guardian of Ancient Kings'.

Guardian of Ancient Kings

Once per day, when you spend your action to summon a guardian, roll+CON.

  • On a 16+: For 3 rounds, all damage you take is halved.
  • On a 9-15: The effect lasts for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The effect lasts for 1 round.

name: Consecration
description:
You sanctify the ground beneath your feet, creating a holy area that burns your enemies and empowers your shield.

In a timed scene, you use 'Consecration'.

Consecration

When you spend your action and 1 MP to sanctify the ground, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You create a 3-square radius area of consecrated ground centered on you. It lasts for 3 rounds. Any enemy who starts their turn in the area takes 1d6 magical damage. Your Shield of the Righteous deals +3 damage to targets inside it.
  • On a 9-15: The area lasts for 2 rounds and has a 2-square radius.
  • On a 1-8: The consecration is weak, lasting only 1 round in a 2-square radius.

name: Grand Crusader
description:
Dodging or blocking an attack gives you a surge of holy power, allowing you to retaliate with your shield.

Grand Crusader

(Passive)

When you successfully use a Reaction to block or reduce the damage of an attack, your next Avenger's Shield or Shield of the Righteous costs 0 SP.

name: Aegis of Light
description:
Your devotion to the Light manifests as a tangible aura of protection for your nearby allies.

Aegis of Light

(Passive)

Allies within a 2-square radius of you (not including yourself) gain +1 Armor.

name: Sanctuary
description:
Standing your ground fills you with holy energy, making you a bastion of defense.

Sanctuary

(Passive)

At the end of your turn, if you did not use your Movement, you gain +1 Armor until the start of your next turn.

name: Bulwark of Order
description:
You are an immovable object of faith and steel. Your very presence dictates the flow of battle.

Bulwark of Order

(Passive)

You are immune to unwilling movement from Push or Pull effects. Additionally, enemies that are adjacent to you cannot use a Move action to leave their square unless they first use the Disengage action.

name: Final Stand
description:
Your Divine Shield ability now acts as a rallying point, taunting all nearby foes to face you.

Final Stand

(Passive)

When you use your Divine Shield feature, all enemies within a 5-square radius are immediately Taunted by you for the duration of the shield.

name: Alchemy: Minor Healing Potion
description:
You know the simple recipe for a basic healing potion. It can be brewed with common herbs at an alchemy lab.

In a timed scene, drinking this grants a 'Minor Heal'.

Minor Heal

When you drink this potion as an action, roll+CON.

  • On a 16+: The potion works perfectly. You heal 1d8+5 HP.
  • On a 9-15: You heal 1d8 HP.
  • On a 1-8: The potion tastes awful. You only heal 1d4 HP.

name: Blacksmithing: Rough Sharpening Stone
description:
You know how to craft a simple sharpening stone from coarse rock. At a forge, you can create these single-use items to give a weapon a temporary edge.

In a timed scene, you can 'Sharpen Blade'.

Sharpen Blade

When you spend an action to sharpen a melee weapon, roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: The weapon's edge is keen. Its attacks deal +3 damage for the next 3 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: The weapon's attacks deal +3 damage for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: You over-sharpen the blade, making it brittle. It deals +5 damage on its next single hit, but then its base damage is reduced by 2 for the rest of combat.

name: Engineering: Copper Bomb
description:
You know the basic schematics for a simple explosive made from a copper tube and rough blasting powder. With a toolkit, you can craft these single-use devices.

In a timed scene, you can 'Throw Bomb'.

Throw Bomb

When you throw a bomb at a target square within 5 squares, roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: The bomb hits its mark, dealing 1d8 fire damage to all creatures in the target square and adjacent squares.
  • On a 9-15: The bomb deals 1d8 fire damage only to creatures in the target square.
  • On a 1-8: The fuse is too short! It explodes early, dealing 1d6 fire damage to you.

name: Tailoring: Linen Bandage
description:
You know how to weave simple linen cloth into effective bandages for treating wounds. This can be done at a loom or with a simple sewing kit.

In a timed scene, you can 'Apply Bandage'.

Apply Bandage

When you spend an action to apply a bandage to an adjacent creature (or yourself), roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The target heals 1d6+3 HP. If they are Bleeding, the condition is removed.
  • On a 9-15: The target heals 1d6 HP.
  • On a 1-8: You apply the bandage poorly; it only heals 1d4 HP and does not stop bleeding.

name: Cooking: Spiced Wolf Meat
description:
You know the recipe for a hearty meal that instills a sense of well-being. It can be cooked over any campfire with the right ingredients.

In a timed scene, an ally can eat this to gain 'Well Fed'.

Well Fed

When a creature eats this meal as an action, roll+CON.

  • On a 16+: The creature gains 5 temporary HP for the rest of the combat and is cured of the Weakened condition.
  • On a 9-15: The creature gains 5 temporary HP.
  • On a 1-8: The meal is undercooked. The creature gains 2 temporary HP but feels nauseous.

name: Alchemy: Potion of Swiftness
description:
You know the recipe for a potion that grants incredible speed. At an alchemy lab, you can brew potions that allow the drinker to move with the swiftness of the wind for a short time.

In a timed scene, you can drink this potion yourself to use 'Burst of Speed'.

Burst of Speed

When you drink a Potion of Swiftness as an action, roll+CON.

  • On a 16+: You may immediately use two Move actions.
  • On a 9-15: You may immediately use one Move action.
  • On a 1-8: You may immediately use one Move action, but the potion makes you dizzy; you are Weakened for 1 round.

name: Engineering: Rocket Boots
description:
You know the explosive schematics for rocket-propelled boots. With a toolkit, you can build a pair that offers incredible, if unpredictable, mobility.

In a timed scene, you can activate them to 'Engage Rockets'.

Engage Rockets

When you activate your boots as an action, roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: You can Shift up to 6 squares in any direction, ignoring obstacles and attacks of opportunity.
  • On a 9-15: You Shift up to 4 squares, but the landing is rough. You are Weakened for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The boots malfunction spectacularly! You Shift 1d6 squares in a random direction and take 1d6 damage from the crash landing.

name: Engineering: Concussive Grenade
description:
You can craft a non-lethal explosive designed to disorient and scatter enemies.

In a timed scene, you can 'Throw Grenade'.

Throw Grenade

When you throw a grenade at a target square within 5 squares, roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: The grenade hits its mark. All creatures in the target and adjacent squares are thrown back (Push 2). If their CON is less than your INT, they are also Stunned for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: The grenade hits the target square, inflicting Push 1 on all creatures within.
  • On a 1-8: You fumble the throw; the grenade lands at your feet, pushing you back 1 square and making you Weakened for 1 round.

name: Tailoring: Shadow Prowler's Cloak
description:
You know how to weave shadows into the fabric of a cloak, allowing the wearer to briefly step out of sight. You can craft this at a loom with enchanted thread.

In a timed scene, you can activate the cloak's magic to 'Shadow Walk'.

Shadow Walk

When you spend an action to activate the cloak, spend 1 MP and roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: You become Invisible and may immediately Shift up to 3 squares.
  • On a 9-15: You become Invisible but cannot move from your current square.
  • On a 1-8: You become translucent, but not fully invisible. The next attack against you has disadvantage.

name: Leatherworking: Grips of the Eagle
description:
You can craft leather gloves with enchanted grips, allowing the wearer to pull themselves to ledges or even enemies with a thrown line.

In a timed scene, you can use 'Grappling Hook'.

Grappling Hook

When you use your action to fire the grappling hook at a surface or creature within 6 squares, roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: Your hook latches on. You may immediately Pull yourself to that location. If you target a creature, they take 1d4 damage.
  • On a 9-15: You successfully pull yourself to the location.
  • On a 1-8: The hook fails to catch, and you are left off-balance and Weakened for 1 round.

name: Alchemy: Potion of Water Walking
description:
You know the recipe for a potion that allows the drinker to walk on the surface of water as if it were solid ground.

In a timed scene, you can drink this to 'Walk on Water'.

Walk on Water

When you drink this potion as an action, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: For the next 3 rounds, you can move over any liquid surface (water, acid, etc.) as if it were normal terrain.
  • On a 9-15: The effect lasts for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The potion is unstable. The effect lasts for 1 round, but if you end your turn on a liquid surface, you fall in.

name: Enchanting: Minor Speed
description:
You know the formula for a minor enchantment that can be applied to boots, quickening the wearer's step. This can be performed at an Arcane Anvil.

In a timed scene, you can 'Bestow Alacrity'.

Bestow Alacrity

When you spend an action to enchant a pair of boots, spend 1 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The target's SPEED is increased by 2 for the rest of the combat.
  • On a 9-15: The target's SPEED is increased by 2 for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: The enchantment is clumsy. The target's SPEED is increased by 1 for 1 round.

name: Alchemy: Mad Alchemist's Potion
description:
You know the recipe for a highly unpredictable potion that triggers a random, temporary mutation in the drinker. You never quite know what you're going to get.

In a timed scene, you can 'Drink the Mystery'.

Drink the Mystery

When you drink this potion as an action, roll+CON. Then roll a d6 to determine the effect:

  • 1-2 (Bad): You polymorph into a chicken for 1 round. You are Stunned.
  • 3-4 (Mixed): You gain stone-like skin, granting you +2 Armor for 2 rounds, but you are Slowed.
  • 5-6 (Good): You grow larger, gaining +2 to STR and +5 temporary HP for 2 rounds.

name: Blacksmithing: Iron Weapon Chain
description:
You know how to forge and attach a sturdy chain to a weapon's hilt, securing it to the wielder's arm to prevent it from being dropped or knocked away.

This knowledge allows you to 'Hold Fast'.

Hold Fast

(Reaction) When you would be affected by a Disarmed condition, you can spend your reaction to roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: You maintain your grip. You ignore the Disarm effect and the enemy is Weakened for 1 round from their failed attempt.
  • On a 9-15: You ignore the Disarm effect.
  • On a 1-8: You barely hold on, but the strain jars your arm. You are not disarmed, but you are Weakened for 1 round.

name: Engineering: Gnomish Battle Chicken
description:
You have the schematics for a loyal, if somewhat squawky, mechanical chicken. It's designed to peck at your enemies and occasionally fly into a helpful frenzy.

In a timed scene, you can 'Deploy Battle Chicken'.

Deploy Battle Chicken

When you spend an action to deploy the chicken in an adjacent square, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The chicken is deployed for 3 rounds. It has 5 HP and its pecks deal 1d4 damage. At the start of its turn, roll a d6. On a 6, it enrages, granting all allies within 3 squares +1 forward for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: The chicken is deployed for 2 rounds.
  • On a 1-8: It malfunctions, attacking the nearest creature (friend or foe) once for 1d4 damage before deactivating.

name: Enchanting: Unholy Weapon
description:
You know the dark formula for binding a shrieking spirit to a weapon, causing its strikes to drain the life force of its victims. This can be performed at an Arcane Anvil.

In a timed scene, you can invoke this power with 'Curse of Weakness'.

Curse of Weakness

When you spend an action and 1 MP to curse an enemy's weapon within 5 squares, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: For 2 rounds, the target's weapon is cursed. Their attacks deal half damage. If their WIS is less than your INT, they also take 1d4 psychic damage each time they attack.
  • On a 9-15: The target's attacks deal half damage for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The curse is unstable. The target's next attack deals half damage, but so does yours.

name: Leatherworking: Rugged Armor Kit
description:
You know how to quickly apply thick, reinforcing leather plates to a suit of armor, providing a temporary buffer against damage. These kits can be crafted in the field.

In a timed scene, you can 'Reinforce Armor'.

Reinforce Armor

When you spend an action to apply an armor kit to an adjacent ally (or yourself), roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: The target gains 8 temporary HP.
  • On a 9-15: The target gains 5 temporary HP.
  • On a 1-8: The plates are bulky. The target gains 3 temporary HP but is Slowed for 1 round.

name: Tailoring: Lightweave Embroidery
description:
You know the secret art of weaving threads of holy light into a spellcaster's robes. This permanent embroidery has a chance to restore the caster's health when they cast spells.

This knowledge manifests as the 'Lightweave' passive effect.

Lightweave

(Passive)

When you cast a spell that costs MP, roll a d6. On a 6, the threads flare with holy energy, healing you for 1d6 HP.

name: Inscription: Glyph of Warding
description:
You can scribe a powerful protective glyph onto a surface. When an enemy steps on it, the rune flares, repelling them with magical force.

In a timed scene, you can 'Inscribe Glyph'.

Inscribe Glyph

When you spend an action and 2 MP to place a glyph in an adjacent empty square, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The glyph is set. The first enemy to enter the square triggers the glyph, taking your SD as magical damage and being thrown back (Push 3). The glyph then vanishes.
  • On a 9-15: The glyph triggers, dealing your SD and inflicting Push 1.
  • On a 1-8: The rune is unstable. It triggers immediately, inflicting Push 1 on you.

name: Steady Shot
description:
You fire a careful, well-placed shot that helps you build focus for a more powerful attack.

This is a Focus generator.

Steady Shot

(Builder) When you attack with a ranged weapon, roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD and generate 30 Focus.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD and generate 20 Focus.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your HD and generate 10 Focus.

name: Aimed Shot
description:
You take a moment to line up the perfect shot, unleashing a devastating arrow that can tear through armor and knock a foe off their feet.

This move uses Focus.

Aimed Shot

When you spend your entire turn aiming, spend 30 Focus and roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD + 10, this attack ignores armor, and you may Push 1 the target.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD + 5, and this attack ignores armor.
  • On a 1-8: You deal your HD, but the attack does not ignore armor and you lose all your Focus.

name: Explosive Shot
description:
You fire a volatile arrow that explodes on impact, knocking your target and nearby enemies away from the blast.

Explosive Shot

When you fire an explosive arrow at a target, spend 20 Focus and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: Your arrow explodes. The primary target takes half your HD, and all creatures within 2 squares of them (including the target) are thrown back (Push 2).
  • On a 9-15: The explosion is smaller. The primary target takes half your HD and is pushed back (Push 1).
  • On a 1-8: The arrow is a dud. It deals half your HD to the primary target with no explosion.

name: Binding Shot
description:
You fire a magical arrow that tethers enemies to its point of impact, stunning them if they try to move away.

Binding Shot

When you fire a binding arrow at an empty square, spend 20 Focus and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The arrow creates a 3-square radius tethered zone for 2 rounds. Any enemy that attempts to move out of the zone is immediately Stunned for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: The zone lasts for 2 rounds, but only affects the first enemy who tries to leave it.
  • On a 1-8: The arrow's magic is weak and only creates a 1-square zone for 1 round.

name: Aspect of the Eagle
description:
You invoke the spirit of the eagle, gaining supernatural agility and allowing you to reposition with a ghostly flap of wings.

Aspect of the Eagle

When you spend an action to activate the aspect, spend 10 Focus and roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: For 2 rounds, your movement is a Shift that does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
  • On a 9-15: The effect lasts for only 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: You can make one Shift up to half your SPEED, then the effect ends.

name: Disengage
description:
You perform an acrobatic leap backwards, creating distance between you and a foe without provoking them.

Disengage

When you are in melee with an enemy, you can spend your action to roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: You may Shift up to 4 squares away from the enemy. You gain +3 forward on your next Volley attack this turn.
  • On a 9-15: You may Shift up to 3 squares away.
  • On a 1-8: You stumble, only moving back 1 square, and the movement provokes an Attack of Opportunity.

name: Flare
description:
You fire a bright flare into the air, revealing all hidden and invisible enemies in an area.

In a timed scene, you use 'Flare'.

Flare

When you spend an action to fire a flare at a point within 10 squares, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: The flare illuminates a 4-square radius area for 3 rounds. All creatures within the area are revealed from stealth or invisibility, and cannot become invisible while inside.
  • On a 9-15: The flare lasts for only 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The flare misfires and lands at your feet, revealing your position to all enemies.

name: Freezing Trap
description:
You place a frost trap that encases the next enemy to step on it in a block of solid ice.

In a timed scene, you use 'Freezing Trap'.

Freezing Trap

When you spend an action to place a trap in an empty adjacent square, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The trap is set. The first enemy to enter the square is frozen solid. If their CON is less than your INT, they are Stunned for 2 rounds. Otherwise, they are Stunned for 1 round. The effect breaks if they take damage.
  • On a 9-15: The target is Stunned for only 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The trap is faulty and immediately triggers, creating a 2x2 patch of slippery ice centered on your square.

name: Hunter's Insight
description:
You focus your senses to track your prey, discerning their location and direction of travel with uncanny accuracy.

In a timed scene, you use 'Hunter's Insight'.

Hunter's Insight
